   1: <?php 
   2: 
   3: namespace RedBeanPHP {
   4: 
   5: /**
   6:  * RedBean Logging interface.
   7:  * Provides a uniform and convenient logging
   8:  * interface throughout RedBeanPHP.
   9:  *
  10:  * @file    RedBean/Logging.php
  11:  * @desc    Logging interface for RedBeanPHP ORM
  12:  * @author  Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community
  13:  * @license BSD/GPLv2
  14:  *
  15:  * copyright (c) G.J.G.T. (Gabor) de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community
  16:  * This source file is subject to the BSD/GPLv2 License that is bundled
  17:  * with this source code in the file license.txt.
  18:  */
  19: interface Logger
  20: {
  21: 
  22:     /**
  23:      * A logger (for\PDO or OCI driver) needs to implement the log method.
  24:      * The log method will receive logging data. Note that the number of parameters is 0, this means
  25:      * all parameters are optional and the number may vary. This way the logger can be used in a very
  26:      * flexible way. Sometimes the logger is used to log a simple error message and in other
  27:      * situations sql and bindings are passed.
  28:      * The log method should be able to accept all kinds of parameters and data by using
  29:      * functions like func_num_args/func_get_args.
  30:      * 
  31:      * @return void
  32:      */
  33:     public function log();
  34: }
  35: } 
  36: 
  37: namespace RedBeanPHP\Logger {
  38: 
  39: use RedBeanPHP\Logger as Logger;
  40: use RedBeanPHP\RedException as RedException;
  41: use RedBeanPHP\RedException\Security as Security;
  42: 
  43: /**
  44:  * Logger. Provides a basic logging function for RedBeanPHP.
  45:  *
  46:  * @file    RedBean/Logger.php
  47:  * @desc    Logger
  48:  * @author  Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community
  49:  * @license BSD/GPLv2
  50:  *
  51:  * Provides a basic logging function for RedBeanPHP.
  52:  *
  53:  * copyright (c) G.J.G.T. (Gabor) de Mooij
  54:  * This source file is subject to the BSD/GPLv2 License that is bundled
  55:  * with this source code in the file license.txt.
  56:  */
  57: class RDefault implements Logger
  58: {
  59: 
  60:     /**
  61:      * @var integer
  62:      */
  63:     protected $mode = 0;
  64: 
  65:     /**
  66:      * @var array
  67:      */
  68:     protected $logs = array();
  69: 
  70:     /**
  71:      * Default logger method logging to STDOUT.
  72:      * This is the default/reference implementation of a logger.
  73:      * This method will write the message value to STDOUT (screen).
  74:      *
  75:      * @param $message (optional)
  76:      *
  77:      * @return void
  78:      */
  79:     public function log()
  80:     {
  81:         if ( func_num_args() < 1 ) return;
  82: 
  83:         foreach ( func_get_args() as $argument ) {
  84:             if ( is_array( $argument ) ) {
  85:                 $log = print_r( $argument, TRUE );
  86:                 if ( $this->mode === 0 ) {
  87:                     echo $log;
  88:                 } else {
  89:                     $this->logs[] = $log;
  90:                 }
  91:             } else {
  92:                 if ( $this->mode === 0 ) {
  93:                     echo $argument;
  94:                 } else {
  95:                     $this->logs[] = $argument;
  96:                 }
  97:             }
  98: 
  99:             if ($this->mode === 0) echo "<br>\n";
 100:         }
 101:     }
 102:     
 103:     /**
 104:      * Returns the logs array.
 105:      * 
 106:      * @return array
 107:      */
 108:     public function getLogs()
 109:     {
 110:         return $this->logs;
 111:     }
 112:     
 113:     /**
 114:      * Empties the logs array.
 115:      * 
 116:      * @return self
 117:      */
 118:     public function clear()
 119:     {
 120:         $this->logs = array();
 121:         return $this;
 122:     }
 123:     
 124:     /**
 125:      * Selects a logging mode.
 126:      * Mode 0 means echoing all statements, while mode 1
 127:      * means populating the logs array.
 128:      * 
 129:      * @param integer $mode mode
 130:      * 
 131:      * @return self
 132:      */
 133:     public function setMode( $mode )
 134:     {
 135:         if ($mode !== 0 && $mode !== 1) {
 136:             throw new RedException( 'Invalid mode selected for logger, use 1 or 0.' );
 137:         }
 138:         $this->mode = $mode;
 139:         return $this;
 140:     }
 141:     
 142:     /**
 143:      * Searches for all log entries in internal log array
 144:      * for $needle and returns those entries.
 145:      * 
 146:      * @param string $needle needle
 147:      * 
 148:      * @return array
 149:      */
 150:     public function grep( $needle )
 151:     {
 152:         $found = array();
 153:         foreach( $this->logs as $logEntry ) {
 154:             if (strpos( $logEntry, $needle ) !== false) $found[] = $logEntry;
 155:         }
 156:         return $found;
 157:     }
 158: }
 159: } 
 160: 
 161: namespace RedBeanPHP {
 162: 
 163: /**
 164:  * Interface for database drivers
 165:  *
 166:  * @file       RedBean/Driver.php
 167:  * @desc       Describes the API for database classes
 168:  * @author     Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community
 169:  * @license    BSD/GPLv2
 170:  *
 171:  * The Driver API conforms to the ADODB pseudo standard
 172:  * for database drivers.
 173:  *
 174:  * copyright (c) G.J.G.T. (Gabor) de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community
 175:  * This source file is subject to the BSD/GPLv2 License that is bundled
 176:  * with this source code in the file license.txt.
 177:  */
 178: interface Driver
 179: {
 180: 
 181:     /**
 182:      * Runs a query and fetches results as a multi dimensional array.
 183:      *
 184:      * @param string $sql      SQL to be executed
 185:      * @param array  $bindings list of values to bind to SQL snippet
 186:      *
 187:      * @return array
 188:      */
 189:     public function GetAll( $sql, $bindings = array() );
 190: 
 191:     /**
 192:      * Runs a query and fetches results as a column.
 193:      *
 194:      * @param string $sql      SQL Code to execute
 195:      * @param array  $bindings list of values to bind to SQL snippet
 196:      *
 197:      * @return array
 198:      */
 199:     public function GetCol( $sql, $bindings = array() );
 200: 
 201:     /**
 202:      * Runs a query and returns results as a single cell.
 203:      *
 204:      * @param string $sql      SQL to execute
 205:      * @param array  $bindings list of values to bind to SQL snippet
 206:      *
 207:      * @return mixed
 208:      */
 209:     public function GetCell( $sql, $bindings = array() );
 210:     
 211:     /**
 212:      * Runs a query and returns results as an associative array
 213:      * indexed by the first column.
 214:      *
 215:      * @param string $sql      SQL to execute
 216:      * @param array  $bindings list of values to bind to SQL snippet
 217:      *
 218:      * @return mixed
 219:      */
 220:     public function GetAssocRow( $sql, $bindings = array() );
 221:     
 222:     /**
 223:      * Runs a query and returns a flat array containing the values of
 224:      * one row.
 225:      *
 226:      * @param string $sql      SQL to execute
 227:      * @param array  $bindings list of values to bind to SQL snippet
 228:      * 
 229:      * @return array
 230:      */
 231:     public function GetRow( $sql, $bindings = array() );
 232: 
 233:     /**
 234:      * Executes SQL code and allows key-value binding.
 235:      * This function allows you to provide an array with values to bind
 236:      * to query parameters. For instance you can bind values to question
 237:      * marks in the query. Each value in the array corresponds to the
 238:      * question mark in the query that matches the position of the value in the
 239:      * array. You can also bind values using explicit keys, for instance
 240:      * array(":key"=>123) will bind the integer 123 to the key :key in the
 241:      * SQL. This method has no return value.
 242:      *
 243:      * @param string $sql      SQL Code to execute
 244:      * @param array  $bindings list of values to bind to SQL snippet
 245:      *
 246:      * @return array Affected Rows
 247:      */
 248:     public function Execute( $sql, $bindings = array() );
 249: 
 250:     /**
 251:      * Returns the latest insert ID if driver does support this
 252:      * feature.
 253:      *
 254:      * @return integer
 255:      */
 256:     public function GetInsertID();
 257: 
 258:     /**
 259:      * Returns the number of rows affected by the most recent query
 260:      * if the currently selected driver driver supports this feature.
 261:      *
 262:      * @return integer
 263:      */
 264:     public function Affected_Rows();
 265: 
 266:     /**
 267:      * Toggles debug mode. In debug mode the driver will print all
 268:      * SQL to the screen together with some information about the
 269:      * results. All SQL code that passes through the driver will be
 270:      * passes on to the screen for inspection.
 271:      * This method has no return value.
 272:      *
 273:      * @param boolean $trueFalse turn on/off
 274:      *
 275:      * @return void
 276:      */
 277:     public function setDebugMode( $tf );
 278: 
 279:     /**
 280:      * Starts a transaction.
 281:      *
 282:      * @return void
 283:      */
 284:     public function CommitTrans();
 285: 
 286:     /**
 287:      * Commits a transaction.
 288:      *
 289:      * @return void
 290:      */
 291:     public function StartTrans();
 292: 
 293:     /**
 294:      * Rolls back a transaction.
 295:      *
 296:      * @return void
 297:      */
 298:     public function FailTrans();
 299: }
 300: }
 301: 
 302: namespace RedBeanPHP\Driver {
 303: 
 304: use RedBeanPHP\Driver as Driver;
 305: use RedBeanPHP\Logger as Logger;
 306: use RedBeanPHP\QueryWriter\AQueryWriter as AQueryWriter;
 307: use RedBeanPHP\RedException\SQL as SQL;
 308: use RedBeanPHP\Logger\RDefault as RDefault;
 309: use RedBeanPHP\PDOCompatible as PDOCompatible;
 310: 
 311: /**
 312:  *\PDO Driver
 313:  * This Driver implements the RedBean Driver API
 314:  *
 315:  * @file    RedBean/PDO.php
 316:  * @desc   \PDO Driver
 317:  * @author  Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community, Desfrenes
 318:  * @license BSD/GPLv2
 319:  *
 320:  * (c) copyright Desfrenes & Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP community
 321:  * This source file is subject to the BSD/GPLv2 License that is bundled
 322:  * with this source code in the file license.txt.
 323:  */
 324: class RPDO implements Driver
 325: {
 326:     /**
 327:      * @var integer
 328:      */
 329:     protected $max;
 330: 
 331:     /**
 332:      * @var string
 333:      */
 334:     protected $dsn;
 335: 
 336:     /**
 337:      * @var boolean
 338:      */
 339:     protected $debug = FALSE;
 340: 
 341:     /**
 342:      * @var Logger
 343:      */
 344:     protected $logger = NULL;
 345: 
 346:     /**
 347:      * @var\PDO
 348:      */
 349:     protected $pdo;
 350: 
 351:     /**
 352:      * @var integer
 353:      */
 354:     protected $affectedRows;
 355: 
 356:     /**
 357:      * @var integer
 358:      */
 359:     protected $resultArray;
 360: 
 361:     /**
 362:      * @var array
 363:      */
 364:     protected $connectInfo = array();
 365: 
 366:     /**
 367:      * @var boolean
 368:      */
 369:     protected $isConnected = FALSE;
 370: 
 371:     /**
 372:      * @var bool
 373:      */
 374:     protected $flagUseStringOnlyBinding = FALSE;
 375:     
 376:     /**
 377:      * @var string 
 378:      */
 379:     protected $mysqlEncoding = '';
 380: 
 381:     /**
 382:      * Binds parameters. This method binds parameters to a\PDOStatement for
 383:      * Query Execution. This method binds parameters as NULL, INTEGER or STRING
 384:      * and supports both named keys and question mark keys.
 385:      *
 386:      * @param \PDOStatement $statement \PDO Statement instance
 387:      * @param  array        $bindings   values that need to get bound to the statement
 388:      *
 389:      * @return void
 390:      */
 391:     protected function bindParams( $statement, $bindings )
 392:     {
 393:         foreach ( $bindings as $key => &$value ) {
 394:             if ( is_integer( $key ) ) {
 395:                 if ( is_null( $value ) ) {
 396:                     $statement->bindValue( $key + 1, NULL,\PDO::PARAM_NULL );
 397:                 } elseif ( !$this->flagUseStringOnlyBinding && AQueryWriter::canBeTreatedAsInt( $value ) && $value <= $this->max ) {
 398:                     $statement->bindParam( $key + 1, $value,\PDO::PARAM_INT );
 399:                 } else {
 400:                     $statement->bindParam( $key + 1, $value,\PDO::PARAM_STR );
 401:                 }
 402:             } else {
 403:                 if ( is_null( $value ) ) {
 404:                     $statement->bindValue( $key, NULL,\PDO::PARAM_NULL );
 405:                 } elseif ( !$this->flagUseStringOnlyBinding && AQueryWriter::canBeTreatedAsInt( $value ) && $value <= $this->max ) {
 406:                     $statement->bindParam( $key, $value,\PDO::PARAM_INT );
 407:                 } else {
 408:                     $statement->bindParam( $key, $value,\PDO::PARAM_STR );
 409:                 }
 410:             }
 411:         }
 412:     }
 413: 
 414:     /**
 415:      * This method runs the actual SQL query and binds a list of parameters to the query.
 416:      * slots. The result of the query will be stored in the protected property
 417:      * $rs (always array). The number of rows affected (result of rowcount, if supported by database)
 418:      * is stored in protected property $affectedRows. If the debug flag is set
 419:      * this function will send debugging output to screen buffer.
 420:      *
 421:      * @param string $sql      the SQL string to be send to database server
 422:      * @param array  $bindings the values that need to get bound to the query slots
 423:      *
 424:      * @return void
 425:      *
 426:      * @throws SQL
 427:      */
 428:     protected function runQuery( $sql, $bindings, $options = array() )
 429:     {
 430:         $this->connect();
 431: 
 432:         if ( $this->debug && $this->logger ) {
 433:             $this->logger->log( $sql, $bindings );
 434:         }
 435: 
 436:         try {
 437:             if ( strpos( 'pgsql', $this->dsn ) === 0 ) {
 438:                 $statement = $this->pdo->prepare( $sql, array(\PDO::PGSQL_ATTR_DISABLE_NATIVE_PREPARED_STATEMENT => TRUE ) );
 439:             } else {
 440:                 $statement = $this->pdo->prepare( $sql );
 441:             }
 442: 
 443:             $this->bindParams( $statement, $bindings );
 444: 
 445:             $statement->execute();
 446: 
 447:             $this->affectedRows = $statement->rowCount();
 448: 
 449:             if ( $statement->columnCount() ) {
 450:                 
 451:                 $fetchStyle = ( isset( $options['fetchStyle'] ) ) ? $options['fetchStyle'] : NULL;
 452:                 
 453:                 $this->resultArray = $statement->fetchAll( $fetchStyle );
 454: 
 455:                 if ( $this->debug && $this->logger ) {
 456:                     $this->logger->log( 'resultset: ' . count( $this->resultArray ) . ' rows' );
 457:                 }
 458:             } else {
 459:                 $this->resultArray = array();
 460:             }
 461:         } catch (\PDOException $e ) {
 462:             //Unfortunately the code field is supposed to be int by default (php)
 463:             //So we need a property to convey the SQL State code.
 464:             $err = $e->getMessage();
 465: 
 466:             if ( $this->debug && $this->logger ) $this->logger->log( 'An error occurred: ' . $err );
 467: 
 468:             $exception = new SQL( $err, 0 );
 469:             $exception->setSQLState( $e->getCode() );
 470: 
 471:             throw $exception;
 472:         }
 473:     }
 474: 
 475:     /**
 476:      * Try to fix MySQL character encoding problems.
 477:      * MySQL < 5.5 does not support proper 4 byte unicode but they
 478:      * seem to have added it with version 5.5 under a different label: utf8mb4.
 479:      * We try to select the best possible charset based on your version data.
 480:      */
 481:     protected function setEncoding() 
 482:     {
 483:         $driver = $this->pdo->getAttribute(\PDO::ATTR_DRIVER_NAME );
 484:         $version = floatval( $this->pdo->getAttribute(\PDO::ATTR_SERVER_VERSION ) );
 485: 
 486:         if ($driver === 'mysql') {
 487:             $encoding = ($version >= 5.5) ? 'utf8mb4' : 'utf8';
 488:             $this->pdo->setAttribute(\PDO::MYSQL_ATTR_INIT_COMMAND, 'SET NAMES '.$encoding ); //on every re-connect
 489:             $this->pdo->exec(' SET NAMES '. $encoding); //also for current connection
 490:             $this->mysqlEncoding = $encoding;
 491:         }
 492:     }
 493: 
 494:     /**
 495:      * Returns the best possible encoding for MySQL based on version data.
 496:      * 
 497:      * @return string
 498:      */
 499:     public function getMysqlEncoding() 
 500:     {
 501:         return $this->mysqlEncoding;
 502:     }
 503: 
 504:     /**
 505:      * Constructor. You may either specify dsn, user and password or
 506:      * just give an existing\PDO connection.
 507:      * Examples:
 508:      *    $driver = new RPDO($dsn, $user, $password);
 509:      *    $driver = new RPDO($existingConnection);
 510:      *
 511:      * @param string|object $dsn    database connection string
 512:      * @param string        $user   optional, usename to sign in
 513:      * @param string        $pass   optional, password for connection login
 514:      *
 515:      */
 516:     public function __construct( $dsn, $user = NULL, $pass = NULL )
 517:     {
 518:         if ( is_object( $dsn ) ) {
 519:             $this->pdo = $dsn;
 520: 
 521:             $this->isConnected = TRUE;
 522: 
 523:             $this->setEncoding();
 524:             $this->pdo->setAttribute(\PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE,\PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION );
 525:             $this->pdo->setAttribute(\PDO::ATTR_DEFAULT_FETCH_MODE,\PDO::FETCH_ASSOC );
 526: 
 527:             // make sure that the dsn at least contains the type
 528:             $this->dsn = $this->getDatabaseType();
 529:         } else {
 530:             $this->dsn = $dsn;
 531: 
 532:             $this->connectInfo = array( 'pass' => $pass, 'user' => $user );
 533:         }
 534:         
 535:         //PHP 5.3 PDO SQLite has a bug with large numbers:
 536:         if ( strpos( $this->dsn, 'sqlite' ) === 0 && PHP_MAJOR_VERSION === 5 && PHP_MINOR_VERSION === 3) {
 537:             $this->max = 2147483647; //otherwise you get -2147483648 ?! demonstrated in build #603 on Travis.
 538:         } else {
 539:             $this->max = PHP_INT_MAX; //the normal value of course (makes it possible to use large numbers in LIMIT clause)
 540:         }
 541:     }
 542: 
 543:     /**
 544:      * Whether to bind all parameters as strings.
 545:      *
 546:      * @param boolean $yesNo pass TRUE to bind all parameters as strings.
 547:      *
 548:      * @return void
 549:      */
 550:     public function setUseStringOnlyBinding( $yesNo )
 551:     {
 552:         $this->flagUseStringOnlyBinding = (boolean) $yesNo;
 553:     }
 554: 
 555:     /**
 556:      * Establishes a connection to the database using PHP\PDO
 557:      * functionality. If a connection has already been established this
 558:      * method will simply return directly. This method also turns on
 559:      * UTF8 for the database and\PDO-ERRMODE-EXCEPTION as well as
 560:      *\PDO-FETCH-ASSOC.
 561:      *
 562:      * @throws\PDOException
 563:      *
 564:      * @return void
 565:      */
 566:     public function connect()
 567:     {
 568:         if ( $this->isConnected ) return;
 569:         try {
 570:             $user = $this->connectInfo['user'];
 571:             $pass = $this->connectInfo['pass'];
 572: 
 573:             $this->pdo = new\PDO(
 574:                 $this->dsn,
 575:                 $user,
 576:                 $pass,
 577:                 array(\PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE            =>\PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION,
 578:                       \PDO::ATTR_DEFAULT_FETCH_MODE =>\PDO::FETCH_ASSOC,
 579:                 )
 580:             );
 581:             
 582:             $this->setEncoding();
 583:             $this->pdo->setAttribute(\PDO::ATTR_STRINGIFY_FETCHES, TRUE );
 584: 
 585:             $this->isConnected = TRUE;
 586:         } catch (\PDOException $exception ) {
 587:             $matches = array();
 588: 
 589:             $dbname  = ( preg_match( '/dbname=(\w+)/', $this->dsn, $matches ) ) ? $matches[1] : '?';
 590: 
 591:             throw new\PDOException( 'Could not connect to database (' . $dbname . ').', $exception->getCode() );
 592:         }
 593:     }
 594: 
 595:     /**
 596:      * @see Driver::GetAll
 597:      */
 598:     public function GetAll( $sql, $bindings = array() )
 599:     {
 600:         $this->runQuery( $sql, $bindings );
 601: 
 602:         return $this->resultArray;
 603:     }
 604:     
 605:     /**
 606:      * @see Driver::GetAssocRow
 607:      */
 608:     public function GetAssocRow( $sql, $bindings = array() )
 609:     {
 610:         $this->runQuery( $sql, $bindings, array( 
 611:                 'fetchStyle' => \PDO::FETCH_ASSOC 
 612:             ) 
 613:         );
 614:         
 615:         return $this->resultArray;
 616:     }
 617:     
 618:     /**
 619:      * @see Driver::GetCol
 620:      */
 621:     public function GetCol( $sql, $bindings = array() )
 622:     {
 623:         $rows = $this->GetAll( $sql, $bindings );
 624: 
 625:         $cols = array();
 626:         if ( $rows && is_array( $rows ) && count( $rows ) > 0 ) {
 627:             foreach ( $rows as $row ) {
 628:                 $cols[] = array_shift( $row );
 629:             }
 630:         }
 631: 
 632:         return $cols;
 633:     }
 634: 
 635:     /**
 636:      * @see Driver::GetCell
 637:      */
 638:     public function GetCell( $sql, $bindings = array() )
 639:     {
 640:         $arr = $this->GetAll( $sql, $bindings );
 641: 
 642:         $row1 = array_shift( $arr );
 643:         $col1 = array_shift( $row1 );
 644: 
 645:         return $col1;
 646:     }
 647: 
 648:     /**
 649:      * @see Driver::GetRow
 650:      */
 651:     public function GetRow( $sql, $bindings = array() )
 652:     {
 653:         $arr = $this->GetAll( $sql, $bindings );
 654: 
 655:         return array_shift( $arr );
 656:     }
 657: 
 658:     /**
 659:      * @see Driver::Excecute
 660:      */
 661:     public function Execute( $sql, $bindings = array() )
 662:     {
 663:         $this->runQuery( $sql, $bindings );
 664: 
 665:         return $this->affectedRows;
 666:     }
 667: 
 668:     /**
 669:      * @see Driver::GetInsertID
 670:      */
 671:     public function GetInsertID()
 672:     {
 673:         $this->connect();
 674: 
 675:         return (int) $this->pdo->lastInsertId();
 676:     }
 677: 
 678:     /**
 679:      * @see Driver::Affected_Rows
 680:      */
 681:     public function Affected_Rows()
 682:     {
 683:         $this->connect();
 684: 
 685:         return (int) $this->affectedRows;
 686:     }
 687: 
 688:     /**
 689:      * Toggles debug mode. In debug mode the driver will print all
 690:      * SQL to the screen together with some information about the
 691:      * results.
 692:      *
 693:      * @param boolean        $trueFalse turn on/off
 694:      * @param Logger $logger    logger instance
 695:      *
 696:      * @return void
 697:      */
 698:     public function setDebugMode( $tf, $logger = NULL )
 699:     {
 700:         $this->connect();
 701: 
 702:         $this->debug = (bool) $tf;
 703: 
 704:         if ( $this->debug and !$logger ) {
 705:             $logger = new RDefault();
 706:         }
 707: 
 708:         $this->setLogger( $logger );
 709:     }
 710: 
 711:     /**
 712:      * Injects Logger object.
 713:      * Sets the logger instance you wish to use.
 714:      *
 715:      * @param Logger $logger the logger instance to be used for logging
 716:      */
 717:     public function setLogger( Logger $logger )
 718:     {
 719:         $this->logger = $logger;
 720:     }
 721: 
 722:     /**
 723:      * Gets Logger object.
 724:      * Returns the currently active Logger instance.
 725:      *
 726:      * @return Logger
 727:      */
 728:     public function getLogger()
 729:     {
 730:         return $this->logger;
 731:     }
 732: 
 733:     /**
 734:      * @see Driver::StartTrans
 735:      */
 736:     public function StartTrans()
 737:     {
 738:         $this->connect();
 739: 
 740:         $this->pdo->beginTransaction();
 741:     }
 742: 
 743:     /**
 744:      * @see Driver::CommitTrans
 745:      */
 746:     public function CommitTrans()
 747:     {
 748:         $this->connect();
 749: 
 750:         $this->pdo->commit();
 751:     }
 752: 
 753:     /**
 754:      * @see Driver::FailTrans
 755:      */
 756:     public function FailTrans()
 757:     {
 758:         $this->connect();
 759: 
 760:         $this->pdo->rollback();
 761:     }
 762: 
 763:     /**
 764:      * Returns the name of database driver for\PDO.
 765:      * Uses the\PDO attribute DRIVER NAME to obtain the name of the
 766:      *\PDO driver.
 767:      *
 768:      * @return string
 769:      */
 770:     public function getDatabaseType()
 771:     {
 772:         $this->connect();
 773: 
 774:         return $this->pdo->getAttribute(\PDO::ATTR_DRIVER_NAME );
 775:     }
 776: 
 777:     /**
 778:      * Returns the version number of the database.
 779:      *
 780:      * @return mixed $version version number of the database
 781:      */
 782:     public function getDatabaseVersion()
 783:     {
 784:         $this->connect();
 785: 
 786:         return $this->pdo->getAttribute(\PDO::ATTR_CLIENT_VERSION );
 787:     }
 788: 
 789:     /**
 790:      * Returns the underlying PHP\PDO instance.
 791:      *
 792:      * @return\PDO
 793:      */
 794:     public function getPDO()
 795:     {
 796:         $this->connect();
 797: 
 798:         return $this->pdo;
 799:     }
 800: 
 801:     /**
 802:      * Closes database connection by destructing\PDO.
 803:      *
 804:      * @return void
 805:      */
 806:     public function close()
 807:     {
 808:         $this->pdo         = NULL;
 809:         $this->isConnected = FALSE;
 810:     }
 811: 
 812:     /**
 813:      * Returns TRUE if the current\PDO instance is connected.
 814:      *
 815:      * @return boolean
 816:      */
 817:     public function isConnected()
 818:     {
 819:         return $this->isConnected && $this->pdo;
 820:     }
 821: }
 822: }
 823: 
 824: namespace RedBeanPHP {
 825: 
 826: use RedBeanPHP\QueryWriter\AQueryWriter as AQueryWriter;
 827: use RedBeanPHP\BeanHelper as BeanHelper;
 828: use RedBeanPHP\RedException\Security as Security;
 829: 
 830: /**
 831:  * OODBBean (Object Oriented DataBase Bean)
 832:  *
 833:  * @file    RedBean/OODBBean.php
 834:  * @desc    The Bean class used for passing information
 835:  * @author  Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP community
 836:  * @license BSD/GPLv2
 837:  *
 838:  * copyright (c) G.J.G.T. (Gabor) de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community.
 839:  * This source file is subject to the BSD/GPLv2 License that is bundled
 840:  * with this source code in the file license.txt.
 841:  */
 842: class OODBBean implements\IteratorAggregate,\ArrayAccess,\Countable
 843: {
 844: 
 845:     /**
 846:      * Whether to skip beautification of columns or not.
 847:      *
 848:      * @var boolean
 849:      */
 850:     private $flagSkipBeau = FALSE;
 851: 
 852:     /**
 853:      * This is where the real properties of the bean live. They are stored and retrieved
 854:      * by the magic getter and setter (__get and __set).
 855:      *
 856:      * @var array $properties
 857:      */
 858:     private $properties = array();
 859: 
 860:     /**
 861:      * Here we keep the meta data of a bean.
 862:      *
 863:      * @var array
 864:      */
 865:     private $__info = array();
 866: 
 867:     /**
 868:      * The BeanHelper allows the bean to access the toolbox objects to implement
 869:      * rich functionality, otherwise you would have to do everything with R or
 870:      * external objects.
 871:      *
 872:      * @var BeanHelper
 873:      */
 874:     private $beanHelper = NULL;
 875: 
 876:     /**
 877:      * @var null
 878:      */
 879:     private $fetchType = NULL;
 880: 
 881:     /**
 882:      * @var string
 883:      */
 884:     private $withSql = '';
 885: 
 886:     /**
 887:      * @var array
 888:      */
 889:     private $withParams = array();
 890: 
 891:     /**
 892:      * @var string
 893:      */
 894:     private $aliasName = NULL;
 895: 
 896:     /**
 897:      * @var string
 898:      */
 899:     private $via = NULL;
 900: 
 901:     /**
 902:      * @var boolean
 903:      */
 904:     private $noLoad = FALSE;
 905: 
 906:     /**
 907:      * @var boolean
 908:      */
 909:     private $all = FALSE;
 910: 
 911:     /** Returns the alias for a type
 912:      *
 913:      * @param string $type type
 914:      *
 915:      * @return string $type type
 916:      */
 917:     private function getAlias( $type )
 918:     {
 919:         if ( $this->fetchType ) {
 920:             $type            = $this->fetchType;
 921:             $this->fetchType = NULL;
 922:         }
 923: 
 924:         return $type;
 925:     }
 926: 
 927:     /**
 928:      * Internal method.
 929:      * Obtains a shared list for a certain type.
 930:      *
 931:      * @param string $type the name of the list you want to retrieve.
 932:      *
 933:      * @return array
 934:      */
 935:     private function getSharedList( $type, $redbean, $toolbox )
 936:     {
 937: 
 938:         $writer = $toolbox->getWriter();
 939: 
 940:         if ( $this->via ) {
 941:             $oldName = $writer->getAssocTable( array( $this->__info['type'], $type ) );
 942:             if ( $oldName !== $this->via ) {
 943:                 //set the new renaming rule
 944:                 $writer->renameAssocTable( $oldName, $this->via );
 945:             }
 946:             $this->via = NULL;
 947:         }
 948: 
 949:         $beans = array();
 950:         if ($this->getID()) {
 951:             $type             = $this->beau( $type );
 952:             $assocManager     = $redbean->getAssociationManager();
 953:             $beans            = $assocManager->related( $this, $type, $this->withSql, $this->withParams );
 954:         }
 955: 
 956:         $this->withSql    = '';
 957:         $this->withParams = array();
 958: 
 959:         return $beans;
 960:     }
 961: 
 962:     /**
 963:      * Internal method.
 964:      * Obtains the own list of a certain type.
 965:      *
 966:      * @param string $type name of the list you want to retrieve
 967:      *
 968:      * @return array
 969:      */
 970:     private function getOwnList( $type, $redbean )
 971:     {
 972:         $type = $this->beau( $type );
 973: 
 974:         if ( $this->aliasName ) {
 975:             $parentField = $this->aliasName;
 976:             $myFieldLink = $parentField . '_id';
 977: 
 978:             $this->__info['sys.alias.' . $type] = $this->aliasName;
 979: 
 980:             $this->aliasName = NULL;
 981:         } else {
 982:             $parentField = $this->__info['type'];
 983:             $myFieldLink = $parentField . '_id';
 984:         }
 985: 
 986:         $beans = array();
 987: 
 988:         if ( $this->getID() ) {
 989: 
 990:             $firstKey = NULL;
 991:             if ( count( $this->withParams ) > 0 ) {
 992:                 reset( $this->withParams );
 993: 
 994:                 $firstKey = key( $this->withParams );
 995:             }
 996: 
 997:             if ( !is_numeric( $firstKey ) || $firstKey === NULL ) {
 998:                 $bindings           = $this->withParams;
 999:                 $bindings[':slot0'] = $this->getID();
1000: 
1001:                 $beans = $redbean->find( $type, array(), " $myFieldLink = :slot0 " . $this->withSql, $bindings );
1002:             } else {
1003:                 $bindings = array_merge( array( $this->getID() ), $this->withParams );
1004: 
1005:                 $beans = $redbean->find( $type, array(), " $myFieldLink = ? " . $this->withSql, $bindings );
1006:             }
1007:         }
1008: 
1009:         $this->withSql    = '';
1010:         $this->withParams = array();
1011: 
1012:         foreach ( $beans as $beanFromList ) {
1013:             $beanFromList->__info['sys.parentcache.' . $parentField] = $this;
1014:         }
1015: 
1016:         return $beans;
1017:     }
1018: 
1019:     /**
1020:      * Sets a meta property for all beans. This is a quicker way to set
1021:      * the meta properties for a collection of beans because this method
1022:      * can directly access the property arrays of the beans.
1023:      * This method returns the beans.
1024:      *
1025:      * @param array  $beans    beans to set the meta property of
1026:      * @param string $property property to set
1027:      * @param mixed  $value    value
1028:      *
1029:      * @return array
1030:      */
1031:     public static function setMetaAll( $beans, $property, $value )
1032:     {
1033:         foreach( $beans as $bean ) {
1034:             $bean->__info[ $property ] = $value;
1035:         }
1036: 
1037:         return $beans;
1038:     }
1039: 
1040:     /**
1041:      * Initializes a bean. Used by OODB for dispensing beans.
1042:      * It is not recommended to use this method to initialize beans. Instead
1043:      * use the OODB object to dispense new beans. You can use this method
1044:      * if you build your own bean dispensing mechanism.
1045:      *
1046:      * @param string             $type       type of the new bean
1047:      * @param BeanHelper $beanhelper bean helper to obtain a toolbox and a model
1048:      *
1049:      * @return void
1050:      */
1051:     public function initializeForDispense( $type, BeanHelper $beanhelper )
1052:     {
1053:         $this->beanHelper         = $beanhelper;
1054:         $this->__info['type']     = $type;
1055:         $this->__info['sys.id']   = 'id';
1056:         $this->__info['sys.orig'] = array( 'id' => 0 );
1057:         $this->__info['tainted']  = TRUE;
1058:         $this->properties['id']   = 0;
1059:     }
1060: 
1061:     /**
1062:      * Sets the Bean Helper. Normally the Bean Helper is set by OODB.
1063:      * Here you can change the Bean Helper. The Bean Helper is an object
1064:      * providing access to a toolbox for the bean necessary to retrieve
1065:      * nested beans (bean lists: ownBean, sharedBean) without the need to
1066:      * rely on static calls to the facade (or make this class dep. on OODB).
1067:      *
1068:      * @param BeanHelper $helper
1069:      *
1070:      * @return void
1071:      */
1072:     public function setBeanHelper( BeanHelper $helper )
1073:     {
1074:         $this->beanHelper = $helper;
1075:     }
1076: 
1077:     /**
1078:      * Returns an\ArrayIterator so you can treat the bean like
1079:      * an array with the properties container as its contents.
1080:      * This method is meant for PHP and allows you to access beans as if
1081:      * they were arrays, i.e. using array notation:
1082:      *
1083:      * $bean[ $key ] = $value;
1084:      *
1085:      * Note that not all PHP functions work with the array interface.
1086:      *
1087:      * @return\ArrayIterator
1088:      */
1089:     public function getIterator()
1090:     {
1091:         return new\ArrayIterator( $this->properties );
1092:     }
1093: 
1094:     /**
1095:      * Imports all values from an associative array $array. Chainable.
1096:      * This method imports the values in the first argument as bean
1097:      * propery and value pairs. Use the second parameter to provide a
1098:      * selection. If a selection array is passed, only the entries
1099:      * having keys mentioned in the selection array will be imported.
1100:      * Set the third parameter to TRUE to preserve spaces in selection keys.
1101:      *
1102:      * @param array        $array     what you want to import
1103:      * @param string|array $selection selection of values
1104:      * @param boolean      $notrim    if TRUE selection keys will NOT be trimmed
1105:      *
1106:      * @return OODBBean
1107:      */
1108:     public function import( $array, $selection = FALSE, $notrim = FALSE )
1109:     {
1110:         if ( is_string( $selection ) ) {
1111:             $selection = explode( ',', $selection );
1112:         }
1113: 
1114:         if ( !$notrim && is_array( $selection ) ) {
1115:             foreach ( $selection as $key => $selected ) {
1116:                 $selection[$key] = trim( $selected );
1117:             }
1118:         }
1119: 
1120:         foreach ( $array as $key => $value ) {
1121:             if ( $key != '__info' ) {
1122:                 if ( !$selection || ( $selection && in_array( $key, $selection ) ) ) {
1123:                     if ( is_array($value ) ) {
1124:                         if ( isset( $value['_type'] ) ) {
1125:                             $bean = $this->beanHelper->getToolbox()->getRedBean()->dispense( $value['_type'] );
1126:                             unset( $value['_type'] );
1127:                             $bean->import($value);
1128:                             $this->$key = $bean;
1129:                         } else {
1130:                             $listBeans = array();
1131:                             foreach( $value as $listKey => $listItem ) {
1132:                                 $bean = $this->beanHelper->getToolbox()->getRedBean()->dispense( $listItem['_type'] );
1133:                                 unset( $listItem['_type'] );
1134:                                 $bean->import($listItem);
1135:                                 $list = &$this->$key;
1136:                                 $list[ $listKey ] = $bean;
1137:                             }
1138:                         }
1139:                     } else {
1140:                         $this->$key = $value;
1141:                     }
1142:                 }
1143:             }
1144:         }
1145: 
1146:         return $this;
1147:     }
1148: 
1149:     /**
1150:     * Fast way to import a row.
1151:     * Does not perform any checks.
1152:     *
1153:     * @param array $row a database row
1154:     *
1155:     * @return self
1156:     */
1157:     public function importRow( $row )
1158:     {
1159:         $this->properties = $row;
1160:         $this->__info['sys.orig'] = $row;
1161:         return $this;
1162:     }
1163: 
1164:     /**
1165:      * Imports data from another bean. Chainable.
1166:      * Copies the properties from the source bean to the internal
1167:      * property list.
1168:      *
1169:      * @param OODBBean $sourceBean the source bean to take properties from
1170:      *
1171:      * @return OODBBean
1172:      */
1173:     public function importFrom( OODBBean $sourceBean )
1174:     {
1175:         $this->__info['tainted'] = TRUE;
1176: 
1177:         $this->properties = $sourceBean->properties;
1178: 
1179:         return $this;
1180:     }
1181: 
1182:     /**
1183:      * Injects the properties of another bean but keeps the original ID.
1184:      * Just like import() but keeps the original ID.
1185:      * Chainable.
1186:      *
1187:      * @param OODBBean $otherBean the bean whose properties you would like to copy
1188:      *
1189:      * @return OODBBean
1190:      */
1191:     public function inject( OODBBean $otherBean )
1192:     {
1193:         $myID = $this->properties['id'];
1194: 
1195:         $this->import( $otherBean->export() );
1196: 
1197:         $this->id = $myID;
1198: 
1199:         return $this;
1200:     }
1201: 
1202:     /**
1203:      * Exports the bean as an array.
1204:      * This function exports the contents of a bean to an array and returns
1205:      * the resulting array.
1206:      *
1207:      * @param boolean $meta    set to TRUE if you want to export meta data as well
1208:      * @param boolean $parents set to TRUE if you want to export parents as well
1209:      * @param boolean $onlyMe  set to TRUE if you want to export only this bean
1210:      * @param array   $filters optional whitelist for export
1211:      *
1212:      * @return array
1213:      */
1214:     public function export( $meta = FALSE, $parents = FALSE, $onlyMe = FALSE, $filters = array() )
1215:     {
1216:         $arr = array();
1217: 
1218:         if ( $parents ) {
1219:             foreach ( $this as $key => $value ) {
1220:                 if ( substr( $key, -3 ) != '_id' ) continue;
1221: 
1222:                 $prop = substr( $key, 0, strlen( $key ) - 3 );
1223:                 $this->$prop;
1224:             }
1225:         }
1226: 
1227:         $hasFilters = is_array( $filters ) && count( $filters );
1228: 
1229:         foreach ( $this as $key => $value ) {
1230:             if ( !$onlyMe && is_array( $value ) ) {
1231:                 $vn = array();
1232: 
1233:                 foreach ( $value as $i => $b ) {
1234:                     $vn[] = $b->export( $meta, FALSE, FALSE, $filters );
1235:                     $value = $vn;
1236:                 }
1237:             } elseif ( $value instanceof OODBBean ) {
1238:                 if ( $hasFilters ) {
1239:                     if ( !in_array( strtolower( $value->getMeta( 'type' ) ), $filters ) ) continue;
1240:                 }
1241: 
1242:                 $value = $value->export( $meta, $parents, FALSE, $filters );
1243:             }
1244: 
1245:             $arr[$key] = $value;
1246:         }
1247: 
1248:         if ( $meta ) {
1249:             $arr['__info'] = $this->__info;
1250:         }
1251: 
1252:         return $arr;
1253:     }
1254: 
1255:     /**
1256:      * Implements isset() function for use as an array.
1257:      *
1258:      * @param string $property name of the property you want to check
1259:      *
1260:      * @return boolean
1261:      */
1262:     public function __isset( $property )
1263:     {
1264:         $property = $this->beau( $property );
1265: 
1266:         if ( strpos( $property, 'xown' ) === 0 && ctype_upper( substr( $property, 4, 1 ) ) ) {
1267:             $property = substr($property, 1);
1268:         }
1269:         return isset( $this->properties[$property] );
1270:     }
1271: 
1272:     /**
1273:      * Returns the ID of the bean no matter what the ID field is.
1274:      *
1275:      * @return string|null
1276:      */
1277:     public function getID()
1278:     {
1279:         return ( isset( $this->properties['id'] ) ) ? (string) $this->properties['id'] : NULL;
1280:     }
1281: 
1282:     /**
1283:      * Unsets a property. This method will load the property first using
1284:      * __get.
1285:      *
1286:      * @param  string $property property
1287:      *
1288:      * @return void
1289:      */
1290:     public function __unset( $property )
1291:     {
1292:         $property = $this->beau( $property );
1293: 
1294:         if ( strpos( $property, 'xown' ) === 0 && ctype_upper( substr( $property, 4, 1 ) ) ) {
1295:             $property = substr($property, 1);
1296:         }
1297: 
1298:         unset( $this->properties[$property] );
1299: 
1300:         $shadowKey = 'sys.shadow.'.$property;
1301:         if ( isset( $this->__info[ $shadowKey ] ) ) unset( $this->__info[$shadowKey] );
1302: 
1303:         //also clear modifiers
1304:         $this->withSql    = '';
1305:         $this->withParams = array();
1306:         $this->aliasName  = NULL;
1307:         $this->fetchType  = NULL;
1308:         $this->noLoad     = FALSE;
1309:         $this->all        = FALSE;
1310:         $this->via        = NULL;
1311: 
1312:         return;
1313:     }
1314: 
1315:     /**
1316:      * Adds WHERE clause conditions to ownList retrieval.
1317:      * For instance to get the pages that belong to a book you would
1318:      * issue the following command: $book->ownPage
1319:      * However, to order these pages by number use:
1320:      *
1321:      * $book->with(' ORDER BY `number` ASC ')->ownPage
1322:      *
1323:      * the additional SQL snippet will be merged into the final
1324:      * query.
1325:      *
1326:      * @param string $sql SQL to be added to retrieval query.
1327:      * @param array       $bindings array with parameters to bind to SQL snippet
1328:      *
1329:      * @return OODBBean
1330:      */
1331:     public function with( $sql, $bindings = array() )
1332:     {
1333:         $this->withSql    = $sql;
1334:         $this->withParams = $bindings;
1335:         return $this;
1336:     }
1337: 
1338:     /**
1339:      * Just like with(). Except that this method prepends the SQL query snippet
1340:      * with AND which makes it slightly more comfortable to use a conditional
1341:      * SQL snippet. For instance to filter an own-list with pages (belonging to
1342:      * a book) on specific chapters you can use:
1343:      *
1344:      * $book->withCondition(' chapter = 3 ')->ownPage
1345:      *
1346:      * This will return in the own list only the pages having 'chapter == 3'.
1347:      *
1348:      * @param string $sql      SQL to be added to retrieval query (prefixed by AND)
1349:      * @param array  $bindings array with parameters to bind to SQL snippet
1350:      *
1351:      * @return OODBBean
1352:      */
1353:     public function withCondition( $sql, $bindings = array() )
1354:     {
1355:         $this->withSql    = ' AND ' . $sql;
1356:         $this->withParams = $bindings;
1357:         return $this;
1358:     }
1359: 
1360:     /**
1361:      * When prefix for a list, this causes the list to reload.
1362:      *
1363:      * @return self
1364:      */
1365:     public function all()
1366:     {
1367:         $this->all = TRUE;
1368:         return $this;
1369:     }
1370: 
1371:     /**
1372:      * Tells the bean to only access the list but not load
1373:      * its contents. Use this if you only want to add something to a list
1374:      * and you have no interest in retrieving its contents from the database.
1375:      *
1376:      * @return self
1377:      */
1378:     public function noLoad()
1379:     {
1380:         $this->noLoad = TRUE;
1381:         return $this;
1382:     }
1383: 
1384:     /**
1385:      * Prepares an own-list to use an alias. This is best explained using
1386:      * an example. Imagine a project and a person. The project always involves
1387:      * two persons: a teacher and a student. The person beans have been aliased in this
1388:      * case, so to the project has a teacher_id pointing to a person, and a student_id
1389:      * also pointing to a person. Given a project, we obtain the teacher like this:
1390:      *
1391:      * $project->fetchAs('person')->teacher;
1392:      *
1393:      * Now, if we want all projects of a teacher we cant say:
1394:      *
1395:      * $teacher->ownProject
1396:      *
1397:      * because the $teacher is a bean of type 'person' and no project has been
1398:      * assigned to a person. Instead we use the alias() method like this:
1399:      *
1400:      * $teacher->alias('teacher')->ownProject
1401:      *
1402:      * now we get the projects associated with the person bean aliased as
1403:      * a teacher.
1404:      *
1405:      * @param string $aliasName the alias name to use
1406:      *
1407:      * @return OODBBean
1408:      */
1409:     public function alias( $aliasName )
1410:     {
1411:         $this->aliasName = $this->beau( $aliasName );
1412: 
1413:         return $this;
1414:     }
1415: 
1416:     /**
1417:      * Returns properties of bean as an array.
1418:      * This method returns the raw internal property list of the
1419:      * bean. Only use this method for optimization purposes. Otherwise
1420:      * use the export() method to export bean data to arrays.
1421:      *
1422:      * @return array
1423:      */
1424:     public function getProperties()
1425:     {
1426:         return $this->properties;
1427:     }
1428: 
1429:     /**
1430:      * Returns properties of bean as an array.
1431:      * This method returns the raw internal property list of the
1432:      * bean. Only use this method for optimization purposes. Otherwise
1433:      * use the export() method to export bean data to arrays.
1434:      * This method returns an array with the properties array and
1435:      * the type (string).
1436:      *
1437:      * @return array
1438:      */
1439:     public function getPropertiesAndType()
1440:     {
1441:         return array( $this->properties, $this->__info['type'] );
1442:     }
1443: 
1444:     /**
1445:      * Turns a camelcase property name into an underscored property name.
1446:      * Examples:
1447:      *    oneACLRoute -> one_acl_route
1448:      *    camelCase -> camel_case
1449:      *
1450:      * Also caches the result to improve performance.
1451:      *
1452:      * @param string $property
1453:      *
1454:      * @return string
1455:      */
1456:     public function beau( $property )
1457:     {
1458:         static $beautifulColumns = array();
1459: 
1460:         if ( ctype_lower( $property ) ) return $property;
1461: 
1462:         if (
1463:             strpos( $property, 'own' ) === 0
1464:             || strpos( $property, 'xown' ) === 0
1465:             || strpos( $property, 'shared' ) === 0
1466:         ) {
1467: 
1468:             $property = preg_replace( '/List$/', '', $property );
1469:             return $property;
1470:         }
1471: 
1472:         if ( !isset( $beautifulColumns[$property] ) ) {
1473:             $beautifulColumns[$property] = AQueryWriter::camelsSnake( $property );
1474:         }
1475: 
1476:         return $beautifulColumns[$property];
1477:     }
1478: 
1479:     /**
1480:      * Returns current status of modification flags.
1481:      *
1482:      * @return string
1483:      */
1484:     public function getModFlags()
1485:     {
1486:         $modFlags = '';
1487:         if ($this->aliasName !== NULL) $modFlags .= 'a';
1488:         if ($this->fetchType !== NULL) $modFlags .= 'f';
1489:         if ($this->noLoad === TRUE) $modFlags .= 'n';
1490:         if ($this->all === TRUE) $modFlags .= 'r';
1491:         if ($this->withSql !== '') $modFlags .= 'w';
1492: 
1493:         return $modFlags;
1494:     }
1495: 
1496:     /**
1497:      * Clears all modifiers.
1498:      *
1499:      * @return self
1500:      */
1501:     public function clearModifiers()
1502:     {
1503:         $this->withSql    = '';
1504:         $this->withParams = array();
1505:         $this->aliasName  = NULL;
1506:         $this->fetchType  = NULL;
1507:         $this->noLoad     = FALSE;
1508:         $this->all        = FALSE;
1509:         $this->via        = NULL;
1510:         return $this;
1511:     }
1512: 
1513:     /**
1514:      * Determines whether a list is opened in exclusive mode or not.
1515:      * If a list has been opened in exclusive mode this method will return TRUE,
1516:      * othwerwise it will return FALSE.
1517:      *
1518:      * @param string $listName name of the list to check
1519:      *
1520:      * @return boolean
1521:      */
1522:     public function isListInExclusiveMode( $listName )
1523:     {
1524:         $listName = $this->beau( $listName );
1525: 
1526:         if ( strpos( $listName, 'xown' ) === 0 && ctype_upper( substr( $listName, 4, 1 ) ) ) {
1527:             $listName = substr($listName, 1);
1528:         }
1529: 
1530:         $listName = lcfirst( substr( $listName, 3 ) );
1531: 
1532:         return ( isset( $this->__info['sys.exclusive-'.$listName] ) && $this->__info['sys.exclusive-'.$listName] );
1533:     }
1534: 
1535:     /**
1536:      * Magic Getter. Gets the value for a specific property in the bean.
1537:      * If the property does not exist this getter will make sure no error
1538:      * occurs. This is because RedBean allows you to query (probe) for
1539:      * properties. If the property can not be found this method will
1540:      * return NULL instead.
1541:      *
1542:      * @param string $property name of the property you wish to obtain the value of
1543:      *
1544:      * @return mixed
1545:      */
1546:     public function &__get( $property )
1547:     {
1548:         $isEx          = FALSE;
1549:         $isOwn         = FALSE;
1550:         $isShared      = FALSE;
1551: 
1552:         if ( !ctype_lower( $property ) ) {
1553:             $property = $this->beau( $property );
1554:             if ( strpos( $property, 'xown' ) === 0 && ctype_upper( substr( $property, 4, 1 ) ) ) {
1555:                 $property = substr($property, 1);
1556:                 $listName = lcfirst( substr( $property, 3 ) );
1557:                 $isEx     = TRUE;
1558:                 $isOwn    = TRUE;
1559:                 $this->__info['sys.exclusive-'.$listName] = TRUE;
1560:             } elseif ( strpos( $property, 'own' ) === 0 && ctype_upper( substr( $property, 3, 1 ) ) )  {
1561:                 $isOwn    = TRUE;
1562:                 $listName = lcfirst( substr( $property, 3 ) );
1563:             } elseif ( strpos( $property, 'shared' ) === 0 && ctype_upper( substr( $property, 6, 1 ) ) ) {
1564:                 $isShared = TRUE;
1565:             }
1566:         }
1567: 
1568:         $fieldLink      = $property . '_id';
1569:         $exists         = isset( $this->properties[$property] );
1570: 
1571:         //If not exists and no field link and no list, bail out.
1572:         if ( !$exists && !isset($this->$fieldLink) && (!$isOwn && !$isShared )) {
1573: 
1574:             $this->withSql    = '';
1575:             $this->withParams = array();
1576:             $this->aliasName  = NULL;
1577:             $this->fetchType  = NULL;
1578:             $this->noLoad     = FALSE;
1579:             $this->all        = FALSE;
1580:             $this->via        = NULL;
1581: 
1582:             $NULL = NULL;
1583:             return $NULL;
1584:         }
1585: 
1586:         $hasAlias       = (!is_null($this->aliasName));
1587:         $differentAlias = ($hasAlias && $isOwn && isset($this->__info['sys.alias.'.$listName])) ?
1588:                                 ($this->__info['sys.alias.'.$listName] !== $this->aliasName) : FALSE;
1589:         $hasSQL         = ($this->withSql !== '' || $this->via !== NULL);
1590:         $hasAll         = (boolean) ($this->all);
1591: 
1592:         //If exists and no list or exits and list not changed, bail out.
1593:         if ( $exists && ((!$isOwn && !$isShared ) ||  (!$hasSQL && !$differentAlias && !$hasAll)) ) {
1594: 
1595:             $this->withSql    = '';
1596:             $this->withParams = array();
1597:             $this->aliasName  = NULL;
1598:             $this->fetchType  = NULL;
1599:             $this->noLoad     = FALSE;
1600:             $this->all        = FALSE;
1601:             $this->via        = NULL;
1602:             return $this->properties[$property];
1603:         }
1604: 
1605: 
1606:         list( $redbean, , , $toolbox ) = $this->beanHelper->getExtractedToolbox();
1607: 
1608:         if ( isset( $this->$fieldLink ) ) {
1609:             $this->__info['tainted'] = TRUE;
1610: 
1611:             if ( isset( $this->__info["sys.parentcache.$property"] ) ) {
1612:                 $bean = $this->__info["sys.parentcache.$property"];
1613:             } else {
1614:                 $type = $this->getAlias( $property );
1615:                 $bean = $redbean->load( $type, $this->properties[$fieldLink] );
1616:             }
1617: 
1618:             $this->properties[$property] = $bean;
1619: 
1620:             $this->withSql    = '';
1621:             $this->withParams = array();
1622:             $this->aliasName  = NULL;
1623:             $this->fetchType  = NULL;
1624:             $this->noLoad     = FALSE;
1625:             $this->all        = FALSE;
1626:             $this->via        = NULL;
1627: 
1628:             return $this->properties[$property];
1629: 
1630:         }
1631:         //Implicit: elseif ( $isOwn || $isShared ) {
1632:         if ( $this->noLoad ) {
1633:             $beans = array();
1634:         } elseif ( $isOwn ) {
1635:             $beans = $this->getOwnList( $listName, $redbean );
1636:         } else {
1637:             $beans = $this->getSharedList( lcfirst( substr( $property, 6 ) ), $redbean, $toolbox );
1638:         }
1639: 
1640:         $this->properties[$property] = $beans;
1641:         $this->__info["sys.shadow.$property"] = $beans;
1642:         $this->__info['tainted']              = TRUE;
1643: 
1644:         $this->withSql    = '';
1645:         $this->withParams = array();
1646:         $this->aliasName  = NULL;
1647:         $this->fetchType  = NULL;
1648:         $this->noLoad     = FALSE;
1649:         $this->all        = FALSE;
1650:         $this->via        = NULL;
1651: 
1652:         return $this->properties[$property];
1653:     }
1654: 
1655:     /**
1656:      * Magic Setter. Sets the value for a specific property.
1657:      * This setter acts as a hook for OODB to mark beans as tainted.
1658:      * The tainted meta property can be retrieved using getMeta("tainted").
1659:      * The tainted meta property indicates whether a bean has been modified and
1660:      * can be used in various caching mechanisms.
1661:      *
1662:      * @param string $property name of the property you wish to assign a value to
1663:      * @param  mixed $value    the value you want to assign
1664:      *
1665:      * @return void
1666:      *
1667:      * @throws Security
1668:      */
1669:     public function __set( $property, $value )
1670:     {
1671:         $isEx          = FALSE;
1672:         $isOwn         = FALSE;
1673:         $isShared      = FALSE;
1674: 
1675:         if ( !ctype_lower( $property ) ) {
1676:             $property = $this->beau( $property );
1677:             if ( strpos( $property, 'xown' ) === 0 && ctype_upper( substr( $property, 4, 1 ) ) ) {
1678:                 $property = substr($property, 1);
1679:                 $listName = lcfirst( substr( $property, 3 ) );
1680:                 $isEx     = TRUE;
1681:                 $isOwn    = TRUE;
1682:                 $this->__info['sys.exclusive-'.$listName] = TRUE;
1683:             } elseif ( strpos( $property, 'own' ) === 0 && ctype_upper( substr( $property, 3, 1 ) ) )  {
1684:                 $isOwn    = TRUE;
1685:                 $listName = lcfirst( substr( $property, 3 ) );
1686:             } elseif ( strpos( $property, 'shared' ) === 0 && ctype_upper( substr( $property, 6, 1 ) ) ) {
1687:                 $isShared = TRUE;
1688:             }
1689:         }
1690: 
1691:         $hasAlias       = (!is_null($this->aliasName));
1692:         $differentAlias = ($hasAlias && $isOwn && isset($this->__info['sys.alias.'.$listName])) ?
1693:                                 ($this->__info['sys.alias.'.$listName] !== $this->aliasName) : FALSE;
1694:         $hasSQL         = ($this->withSql !== '' || $this->via !== NULL);
1695:         $exists         = isset( $this->properties[$property] );
1696:         $fieldLink      = $property . '_id';
1697: 
1698:         if ( ($isOwn || $isShared) &&  (!$exists || $hasSQL || $differentAlias) ) {
1699: 
1700:             if ( !$this->noLoad ) {
1701:                 list( $redbean, , , $toolbox ) = $this->beanHelper->getExtractedToolbox();
1702:                 if ( $isOwn ) {
1703:                     $beans = $this->getOwnList( $listName, $redbean );
1704:                 } else {
1705:                     $beans = $this->getSharedList( lcfirst( substr( $property, 6 ) ), $redbean, $toolbox );
1706:                 }
1707:                 $this->__info["sys.shadow.$property"] = $beans;
1708:             }
1709:         }
1710: 
1711:         $this->withSql    = '';
1712:         $this->withParams = array();
1713:         $this->aliasName  = NULL;
1714:         $this->fetchType  = NULL;
1715:         $this->noLoad     = FALSE;
1716:         $this->all        = FALSE;
1717:         $this->via        = NULL;
1718: 
1719:         $this->__info['tainted'] = TRUE;
1720: 
1721:         if ( array_key_exists( $fieldLink, $this->properties ) && !( $value instanceof OODBBean ) ) {
1722:             if ( is_null( $value ) || $value === FALSE ) {
1723: 
1724:                 unset( $this->properties[ $property ]);
1725:                 $this->properties[ $fieldLink ] = NULL;
1726: 
1727:                 return;
1728:             } else {
1729:                 throw new RedException( 'Cannot cast to bean.' );
1730:             }
1731:         }
1732: 
1733:         if ( $value === FALSE ) {
1734:             $value = '0';
1735:         } elseif ( $value === TRUE ) {
1736:             $value = '1';
1737:         } elseif ( $value instanceof \DateTime ) {
1738:             $value = $value->format( 'Y-m-d H:i:s' );
1739:         }
1740: 
1741:         $this->properties[$property] = $value;
1742:     }
1743: 
1744:     /**
1745:      * Sets a property directly, for internal use only.
1746:      *
1747:      * @param string  $property     property
1748:      * @param mixed   $value        value
1749:      * @param boolean $updateShadow whether you want to update the shadow
1750:      * @param boolean $taint        whether you want to mark the bean as tainted
1751:      *
1752:      * @return void
1753:      */
1754:     public function setProperty( $property, $value, $updateShadow = FALSE, $taint = FALSE )
1755:     {
1756:         $this->properties[$property] = $value;
1757: 
1758:         if ( $updateShadow ) {
1759:             $this->__info['sys.shadow.' . $property] = $value;
1760:         }
1761: 
1762:         if ( $taint ) {
1763:             $this->__info['tainted'] = TRUE;
1764:         }
1765:     }
1766: 
1767:     /**
1768:      * Returns the value of a meta property. A meta property
1769:      * contains extra information about the bean object that will not
1770:      * get stored in the database. Meta information is used to instruct
1771:      * RedBean as well as other systems how to deal with the bean.
1772:      * For instance: $bean->setMeta("buildcommand.unique", array(
1773:      * array("column1", "column2", "column3") ) );
1774:      * Will add a UNIQUE constraint for the bean on columns: column1, column2 and
1775:      * column 3.
1776:      * To access a Meta property we use a dot separated notation.
1777:      * If the property cannot be found this getter will return NULL instead.
1778:      *
1779:      * @param string $path    path
1780:      * @param mixed  $default default value
1781:      *
1782:      * @return mixed
1783:      */
1784:     public function getMeta( $path, $default = NULL )
1785:     {
1786:         return ( isset( $this->__info[$path] ) ) ? $this->__info[$path] : $default;
1787:     }
1788: 
1789:     /**
1790:      * Stores a value in the specified Meta information property. $value contains
1791:      * the value you want to store in the Meta section of the bean and $path
1792:      * specifies the dot separated path to the property. For instance "my.meta.property".
1793:      * If "my" and "meta" do not exist they will be created automatically.
1794:      *
1795:      * @param string $path  path
1796:      * @param mixed  $value value
1797:      *
1798:      * @return OODBBean
1799:      */
1800:     public function setMeta( $path, $value )
1801:     {
1802:         $this->__info[$path] = $value;
1803: 
1804:         return $this;
1805:     }
1806: 
1807:     /**
1808:      * Copies the meta information of the specified bean
1809:      * This is a convenience method to enable you to
1810:      * exchange meta information easily.
1811:      *
1812:      * @param OODBBean $bean
1813:      *
1814:      * @return OODBBean
1815:      */
1816:     public function copyMetaFrom( OODBBean $bean )
1817:     {
1818:         $this->__info = $bean->__info;
1819: 
1820:         return $this;
1821:     }
1822: 
1823:     /**
1824:      * Sends the call to the registered model.
1825:      *
1826:      * @param string $method name of the method
1827:      * @param array  $args   argument list
1828:      *
1829:      * @return mixed
1830:      */
1831:     public function __call( $method, $args )
1832:     {
1833:         if ( !isset( $this->__info['model'] ) ) {
1834:             $model = $this->beanHelper->getModelForBean( $this );
1835: 
1836:             if ( !$model ) {
1837:                 return NULL;
1838:             }
1839: 
1840:             $this->__info['model'] = $model;
1841:         }
1842:         if ( !method_exists( $this->__info['model'], $method ) ) {
1843:             return NULL;
1844:         }
1845: 
1846:         return call_user_func_array( array( $this->__info['model'], $method ), $args );
1847:     }
1848: 
1849:     /**
1850:      * Implementation of __toString Method
1851:      * Routes call to Model. If the model implements a __toString() method this
1852:      * method will be called and the result will be returned. In case of an
1853:      * echo-statement this result will be printed. If the model does not
1854:      * implement a __toString method, this method will return a JSON
1855:      * representation of the current bean.
1856:      *
1857:      * @return string
1858:      */
1859:     public function __toString()
1860:     {
1861:         $string = $this->__call( '__toString', array() );
1862: 
1863:         if ( $string === NULL ) {
1864:             return json_encode( $this->properties );
1865:         } else {
1866:             return $string;
1867:         }
1868:     }
1869: 
1870:     /**
1871:      * Implementation of Array Access Interface, you can access bean objects
1872:      * like an array.
1873:      * Call gets routed to __set.
1874:      *
1875:      * @param  mixed $offset offset string
1876:      * @param  mixed $value  value
1877:      *
1878:      * @return void
1879:      */
1880:     public function offsetSet( $offset, $value )
1881:     {
1882:         $this->__set( $offset, $value );
1883:     }
1884: 
1885:     /**
1886:      * Implementation of Array Access Interface, you can access bean objects
1887:      * like an array.
1888:      *
1889:      * Array functions do not reveal x-own-lists and list-alias because
1890:      * you dont want duplicate entries in foreach-loops.
1891:      * Also offers a slight performance improvement for array access.
1892:      *
1893:      * @param  mixed $offset property
1894:      *
1895:      * @return boolean
1896:      */
1897:     public function offsetExists( $offset )
1898:     {
1899:         return $this->__isset( $offset );
1900:     }
1901: 
1902:     /**
1903:      * Implementation of Array Access Interface, you can access bean objects
1904:      * like an array.
1905:      * Unsets a value from the array/bean.
1906:      *
1907:      * Array functions do not reveal x-own-lists and list-alias because
1908:      * you dont want duplicate entries in foreach-loops.
1909:      * Also offers a slight performance improvement for array access.
1910:      *
1911:      * @param  mixed $offset property
1912:      *
1913:      * @return void
1914:      */
1915:     public function offsetUnset( $offset )
1916:     {
1917:         $this->__unset( $offset );
1918:     }
1919: 
1920:     /**
1921:      * Implementation of Array Access Interface, you can access bean objects
1922:      * like an array.
1923:      * Returns value of a property.
1924:      *
1925:      * Array functions do not reveal x-own-lists and list-alias because
1926:      * you dont want duplicate entries in foreach-loops.
1927:      * Also offers a slight performance improvement for array access.
1928:      *
1929:      * @param  mixed $offset property
1930:      *
1931:      * @return mixed
1932:      */
1933:     public function &offsetGet( $offset )
1934:     {
1935:         return $this->__get( $offset );
1936:     }
1937: 
1938:     /**
1939:      * Chainable method to cast a certain ID to a bean; for instance:
1940:      * $person = $club->fetchAs('person')->member;
1941:      * This will load a bean of type person using member_id as ID.
1942:      *
1943:      * @param  string $type preferred fetch type
1944:      *
1945:      * @return OODBBean
1946:      */
1947:     public function fetchAs( $type )
1948:     {
1949:         $this->fetchType = $type;
1950: 
1951:         return $this;
1952:     }
1953: 
1954:     /**
1955:      * For polymorphic bean relations.
1956:      * Same as fetchAs but uses a column instead of a direct value.
1957:      *
1958:      * @param string $column
1959:      *
1960:      * @return OODBBean
1961:      */
1962:     public function poly( $field )
1963:     {
1964:         return $this->fetchAs( $this->$field );
1965:     }
1966: 
1967:     /**
1968:      * Traverses a bean property with the specified function.
1969:      * Recursively iterates through the property invoking the
1970:      * function for each bean along the way passing the bean to it.
1971:      *
1972:      * Can be used together with with, withCondition, alias and fetchAs.
1973:      *
1974:      * @param string  $property property
1975:      * @param closure $function function
1976:      *
1977:      * @return OODBBean
1978:      */
1979:     public function traverse( $property, $function, $maxDepth = NULL )
1980:     {
1981:         $this->via = NULL;
1982:         if ( strpos( $property, 'shared' ) !== FALSE ) {
1983:             throw new RedException( 'Traverse only works with (x)own-lists.' );
1984:         }
1985: 
1986:         if ( !is_null( $maxDepth ) ) {
1987:             if ( !$maxDepth-- ) return $this;
1988:         }
1989: 
1990:         $oldFetchType = $this->fetchType;
1991:         $oldAliasName = $this->aliasName;
1992:         $oldWith      = $this->withSql;
1993:         $oldBindings  = $this->withParams;
1994: 
1995:         $beans = $this->$property;
1996: 
1997:         if ( $beans === NULL ) return $this;
1998: 
1999:         if ( !is_array( $beans ) ) $beans = array( $beans );
2000: 
2001:         foreach( $beans as $bean ) {
2002: 
2003:             $function( $bean );
2004: 
2005:             $bean->fetchType  = $oldFetchType;
2006:             $bean->aliasName  = $oldAliasName;
2007:             $bean->withSql    = $oldWith;
2008:             $bean->withParams = $oldBindings;
2009: 
2010:             $bean->traverse( $property, $function, $maxDepth );
2011:         }
2012: 
2013:         return $this;
2014:     }
2015: 
2016:     /**
2017:      * Implementation of\Countable interface. Makes it possible to use
2018:      * count() function on a bean.
2019:      *
2020:      * @return integer
2021:      */
2022:     public function count()
2023:     {
2024:         return count( $this->properties );
2025:     }
2026: 
2027:     /**
2028:      * Checks whether a bean is empty or not.
2029:      * A bean is empty if it has no other properties than the id field OR
2030:      * if all the other property are empty().
2031:      *
2032:      * @return boolean
2033:      */
2034:     public function isEmpty()
2035:     {
2036:         $empty = TRUE;
2037:         foreach ( $this->properties as $key => $value ) {
2038:             if ( $key == 'id' ) {
2039:                 continue;
2040:             }
2041:             if ( !empty( $value ) ) {
2042:                 $empty = FALSE;
2043:             }
2044:         }
2045: 
2046:         return $empty;
2047:     }
2048: 
2049:     /**
2050:      * Chainable setter.
2051:      *
2052:      * @param string $property the property of the bean
2053:      * @param mixed  $value    the value you want to set
2054:      *
2055:      * @return OODBBean
2056:      */
2057:     public function setAttr( $property, $value )
2058:     {
2059:         $this->$property = $value;
2060: 
2061:         return $this;
2062:     }
2063: 
2064:     /**
2065:      * Comfort method.
2066:      * Unsets all properties in array.
2067:      *
2068:      * @param array $properties properties you want to unset.
2069:      *
2070:      * @return OODBBean
2071:      */
2072:     public function unsetAll( $properties )
2073:     {
2074:         foreach ( $properties as $prop ) {
2075:             if ( isset( $this->properties[$prop] ) ) {
2076:                 unset( $this->properties[$prop] );
2077:             }
2078:         }
2079: 
2080:         return $this;
2081:     }
2082: 
2083:     /**
2084:      * Returns original (old) value of a property.
2085:      * You can use this method to see what has changed in a
2086:      * bean.
2087:      *
2088:      * @param string $property name of the property you want the old value of
2089:      *
2090:      * @return mixed
2091:      */
2092:     public function old( $property )
2093:     {
2094:         $old = $this->getMeta( 'sys.orig', array() );
2095: 
2096:         if ( array_key_exists( $property, $old ) ) {
2097:             return $old[$property];
2098:         }
2099: 
2100:         return NULL;
2101:     }
2102: 
2103:     /**
2104:      * Convenience method.
2105:      * Returns TRUE if the bean has been changed, or FALSE otherwise.
2106:      * Same as $bean->getMeta('tainted');
2107:      * Note that a bean becomes tainted as soon as you retrieve a list from
2108:      * the bean. This is because the bean lists are arrays and the bean cannot
2109:      * determine whether you have made modifications to a list so RedBeanPHP
2110:      * will mark the whole bean as tainted.
2111:      *
2112:      * @return boolean
2113:      */
2114:     public function isTainted()
2115:     {
2116:         return $this->getMeta( 'tainted' );
2117:     }
2118: 
2119:     /**
2120:      * Returns TRUE if the value of a certain property of the bean has been changed and
2121:      * FALSE otherwise.
2122:      *
2123:      * @param string $property name of the property you want the change-status of
2124:      *
2125:      * @return boolean
2126:      */
2127:     public function hasChanged( $property )
2128:     {
2129:         return ( array_key_exists( $property, $this->properties ) ) ?
2130:             $this->old( $property ) != $this->properties[$property] : FALSE;
2131:     }
2132: 
2133:     /**
2134:      * Creates a N-M relation by linking an intermediate bean.
2135:      * This method can be used to quickly connect beans using indirect
2136:      * relations. For instance, given an album and a song you can connect the two
2137:      * using a track with a number like this:
2138:      *
2139:      * Usage:
2140:      *
2141:      * $album->link('track', array('number'=>1))->song = $song;
2142:      *
2143:      * or:
2144:      *
2145:      * $album->link($trackBean)->song = $song;
2146:      *
2147:      * What this method does is adding the link bean to the own-list, in this case
2148:      * ownTrack. If the first argument is a string and the second is an array or
2149:      * a JSON string then the linking bean gets dispensed on-the-fly as seen in
2150:      * example #1. After preparing the linking bean, the bean is returned thus
2151:      * allowing the chained setter: ->song = $song.
2152:      *
2153:      * @param string|OODBBean $type          type of bean to dispense or the full bean
2154:      * @param string|array            $qualification JSON string or array (optional)
2155:      *
2156:      * @return OODBBean
2157:      */
2158:     public function link( $typeOrBean, $qualification = array() )
2159:     {
2160:         if ( is_string( $typeOrBean ) ) {
2161: 
2162:             $typeOrBean = AQueryWriter::camelsSnake( $typeOrBean );
2163: 
2164:             $bean = $this->beanHelper->getToolBox()->getRedBean()->dispense( $typeOrBean );
2165: 
2166:             if ( is_string( $qualification ) ) {
2167:                 $data = json_decode( $qualification, TRUE );
2168:             } else {
2169:                 $data = $qualification;
2170:             }
2171: 
2172:             foreach ( $data as $key => $value ) {
2173:                 $bean->$key = $value;
2174:             }
2175:         } else {
2176:             $bean = $typeOrBean;
2177:         }
2178: 
2179:         $list = 'own' . ucfirst( $bean->getMeta( 'type' ) );
2180: 
2181:         array_push( $this->$list, $bean );
2182: 
2183:         return $bean;
2184:     }
2185: 
2186:     /**
2187:      * Returns the same bean freshly loaded from the database.
2188:      *
2189:      * @return OODBBean
2190:      */
2191:     public function fresh()
2192:     {
2193:         return $this->beanHelper->getToolbox()->getRedBean()->load( $this->getMeta( 'type' ), $this->properties['id'] );
2194:     }
2195: 
2196:     /**
2197:      * Registers a association renaming globally.
2198:      *
2199:      * @param string $via type you wish to use for shared lists
2200:      *
2201:      * @return OODBBean
2202:      */
2203:     public function via( $via )
2204:     {
2205:         $this->via = $via;
2206: 
2207:         return $this;
2208:     }
2209: 
2210:     /**
2211:      * Counts all own beans of type $type.
2212:      * Also works with alias(), with() and withCondition().
2213:      *
2214:      * @param string $type the type of bean you want to count
2215:      *
2216:      * @return integer
2217:      */
2218:     public function countOwn( $type )
2219:     {
2220:         $type = $this->beau( $type );
2221: 
2222:         if ( $this->aliasName ) {
2223:             $myFieldLink     = $this->aliasName . '_id';
2224: 
2225:             $this->aliasName = NULL;
2226:         } else {
2227:             $myFieldLink = $this->__info['type'] . '_id';
2228:         }
2229: 
2230:         $count = 0;
2231: 
2232:         if ( $this->getID() ) {
2233: 
2234:             $firstKey = NULL;
2235:             if ( count( $this->withParams ) > 0 ) {
2236:                 reset( $this->withParams );
2237:                 $firstKey = key( $this->withParams );
2238:             }
2239: 
2240:             if ( !is_numeric( $firstKey ) || $firstKey === NULL ) {
2241:                     $bindings           = $this->withParams;
2242:                     $bindings[':slot0'] = $this->getID();
2243:                     $count              = $this->beanHelper->getToolbox()->getWriter()->queryRecordCount( $type, array(), " $myFieldLink = :slot0 " . $this->withSql, $bindings );
2244:             } else {
2245:                     $bindings = array_merge( array( $this->getID() ), $this->withParams );
2246:                     $count    = $this->beanHelper->getToolbox()->getWriter()->queryRecordCount( $type, array(), " $myFieldLink = ? " . $this->withSql, $bindings );
2247:             }
2248: 
2249:         }
2250: 
2251:         $this->clearModifiers();
2252:         return (int) $count;
2253:     }
2254: 
2255:     /**
2256:      * Counts all shared beans of type $type.
2257:      * Also works with via(), with() and withCondition().
2258:      *
2259:      * @param string $type type of bean you wish to count
2260:      *
2261:      * @return integer
2262:      */
2263:     public function countShared( $type )
2264:     {
2265:         $toolbox = $this->beanHelper->getToolbox();
2266:         $redbean = $toolbox->getRedBean();
2267:         $writer  = $toolbox->getWriter();
2268: 
2269:         if ( $this->via ) {
2270:             $oldName = $writer->getAssocTable( array( $this->__info['type'], $type ) );
