4470:         $this->adapter->exec( 'SET FOREIGN_KEY_CHECKS = 1;' );
4471:     }
4472: }
4473: } 
4474: 
4475: namespace RedBeanPHP\QueryWriter {
4476: 
4477: use RedBeanPHP\QueryWriter\AQueryWriter as AQueryWriter;
4478: use RedBeanPHP\QueryWriter as QueryWriter;
4479: use RedBeanPHP\Adapter\DBAdapter as DBAdapter;
4480: use RedBeanPHP\Adapter as Adapter;
4481: 
4482: /**
4483:  * RedBean SQLiteWriter with support for SQLite types
4484:  *
4485:  * @file    RedBean/QueryWriter/SQLiteT.php
4486:  * @desc    Represents a SQLite Database to RedBean
4487:  * @author  Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community
4488:  * @license BSD/GPLv2
4489:  *
4490:  * (c) copyright G.J.G.T. (Gabor) de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community.
4491:  * This source file is subject to the BSD/GPLv2 License that is bundled
4492:  * with this source code in the file license.txt.
4493:  */
4494: class SQLiteT extends AQueryWriter implements QueryWriter
4495: {
4496:     /**
4497:      * @var DBAdapter
4498:      */
4499: 
4500:     protected $adapter;
4501: 
4502:     /**
4503:      * @var string
4504:      */
4505:     protected $quoteCharacter = '`';
4506: 
4507:     /**
4508:      * Data types
4509:      */
4510:     const C_DATATYPE_INTEGER   = 0;
4511:     const C_DATATYPE_NUMERIC   = 1;
4512:     const C_DATATYPE_TEXT      = 2;
4513:     const C_DATATYPE_SPECIFIED = 99;
4514: 
4515:     /**
4516:      * Gets all information about a table (from a type).
4517:      *
4518:      * Format:
4519:      * array(
4520:      *    name => name of the table
4521:      *    columns => array( name => datatype )
4522:      *    indexes => array() raw index information rows from PRAGMA query
4523:      *    keys => array() raw key information rows from PRAGMA query
4524:      * )
4525:      *
4526:      * @param string $type type you want to get info of
4527:      *
4528:      * @return array $info
4529:      */
4530:     protected function getTable( $type )
4531:     {
4532:         $tableName = $this->esc( $type, TRUE );
4533:         $columns   = $this->getColumns( $type );
4534:         $indexes   = $this->getIndexes( $type );
4535:         $keys      = $this->getKeys( $type );
4536: 
4537:         $table = array(
4538:             'columns' => $columns,
4539:             'indexes' => $indexes,
4540:             'keys' => $keys,
4541:             'name' => $tableName
4542:         );
4543: 
4544:         $this->tableArchive[$tableName] = $table;
4545: 
4546:         return $table;
4547:     }
4548: 
4549:     /**
4550:      * Puts a table. Updates the table structure.
4551:      * In SQLite we can't change columns, drop columns, change or add foreign keys so we
4552:      * have a table-rebuild function. You simply load your table with getTable(), modify it and
4553:      * then store it with putTable()...
4554:      *
4555:      * @param array $tableMap information array
4556:      */
4557:     protected function putTable( $tableMap )
4558:     {
4559:         $table = $tableMap['name'];
4560:         $q     = array();
4561:         $q[]   = "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS tmp_backup;";
4562: 
4563:         $oldColumnNames = array_keys( $this->getColumns( $table ) );
4564: 
4565:         foreach ( $oldColumnNames as $k => $v ) $oldColumnNames[$k] = "`$v`";
4566: 
4567:         $q[] = "CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmp_backup(" . implode( ",", $oldColumnNames ) . ");";
4568:         $q[] = "INSERT INTO tmp_backup SELECT * FROM `$table`;";
4569:         $q[] = "PRAGMA foreign_keys = 0 ";
4570:         $q[] = "DROP TABLE `$table`;";
4571: 
4572:         $newTableDefStr = '';
4573:         foreach ( $tableMap['columns'] as $column => $type ) {
4574:             if ( $column != 'id' ) {
4575:                 $newTableDefStr .= ",`$column` $type";
4576:             }
4577:         }
4578: 
4579:         $fkDef = '';
4580:         foreach ( $tableMap['keys'] as $key ) {
4581:             $fkDef .= ", FOREIGN KEY(`{$key['from']}`)
4582:                          REFERENCES `{$key['table']}`(`{$key['to']}`)
4583:                          ON DELETE {$key['on_delete']} ON UPDATE {$key['on_update']}";
4584:         }
4585: 
4586:         $q[] = "CREATE TABLE `$table` ( `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT  $newTableDefStr  $fkDef );";
4587: 
4588:         foreach ( $tableMap['indexes'] as $name => $index ) {
4589:             if ( strpos( $name, 'UQ_' ) === 0 ) {
4590:                 $cols = explode( '__', substr( $name, strlen( 'UQ_' . $table ) ) );
4591:                 foreach ( $cols as $k => $v ) $cols[$k] = "`$v`";
4592:                 $q[] = "CREATE UNIQUE INDEX $name ON `$table` (" . implode( ',', $cols ) . ")";
4593:             } else $q[] = "CREATE INDEX $name ON `$table` ({$index['name']}) ";
4594:         }
4595: 
4596:         $q[] = "INSERT INTO `$table` SELECT * FROM tmp_backup;";
4597:         $q[] = "DROP TABLE tmp_backup;";
4598:         $q[] = "PRAGMA foreign_keys = 1 ";
4599: 
4600:         foreach ( $q as $sq ) $this->adapter->exec( $sq );
4601:     }
4602: 
4603:     /**
4604:      * Returns the indexes for type $type.
4605:      *
4606:      * @param string $type
4607:      *
4608:      * @return array $indexInfo index information
4609:      */
4610:     protected function getIndexes( $type )
4611:     {
4612:         $table   = $this->esc( $type, TRUE );
4613:         $indexes = $this->adapter->get( "PRAGMA index_list('$table')" );
4614: 
4615:         $indexInfoList = array();
4616:         foreach ( $indexes as $i ) {
4617:             $indexInfoList[$i['name']] = $this->adapter->getRow( "PRAGMA index_info('{$i['name']}') " );
4618: 
4619:             $indexInfoList[$i['name']]['unique'] = $i['unique'];
4620:         }
4621: 
4622:         return $indexInfoList;
4623:     }
4624: 
4625:     /**
4626:      * Returns the keys for type $type.
4627:      *
4628:      * @param string $type
4629:      *
4630:      * @return array $keysInfo keys information
4631:      */
4632:     protected function getKeys( $type )
4633:     {
4634:         $table = $this->esc( $type, TRUE );
4635:         $keys  = $this->adapter->get( "PRAGMA foreign_key_list('$table')" );
4636: 
4637:         $keyInfoList = array();
4638:         foreach ( $keys as $k ) {
4639:             $keyInfoList['from_' . $k['from'] . '_to_table_' . $k['table'] . '_col_' . $k['to']] = $k;
4640:         }
4641: 
4642:         return $keyInfoList;
4643:     }
4644: 
4645:     /**
4646:      * Adds a foreign key to a type
4647:      *
4648:      * @param  string  $type        type you want to modify table of
4649:      * @param  string  $targetType  target type
4650:      * @param  string  $field       field of the type that needs to get the fk
4651:      * @param  string  $targetField field where the fk needs to point to
4652:      * @param  integer $buildopt    0 = NO ACTION, 1 = ON DELETE CASCADE
4653:      *
4654:      * @return boolean $didIt
4655:      *
4656:      * @note: cant put this in try-catch because that can hide the fact
4657:      *      that database has been damaged.
4658:      */
4659:     protected function buildFK( $type, $targetType, $field, $targetField, $constraint = FALSE )
4660:     {
4661:         $consSQL = ( $constraint ? 'CASCADE' : 'SET NULL' );
4662: 
4663:         $t       = $this->getTable( $type );
4664:         $label   = 'from_' . $field . '_to_table_' . $targetType . '_col_' . $targetField;
4665: 
4666:         foreach($t['keys'] as $key) {
4667:             if ($key['from'] === $field) return FALSE;
4668:         }
4669: 
4670:         $t['keys'][$label] = array(
4671:             'table'     => $targetType,
4672:             'from'      => $field,
4673:             'to'        => $targetField,
4674:             'on_update' => $consSQL,
4675:             'on_delete' => $consSQL
4676:         );
4677: 
4678:         $this->putTable( $t );
4679: 
4680:         return TRUE;
4681:     }
4682: 
4683:     /**
4684:      * Add the constraints for a specific database driver: SQLite.
4685:      *
4686:      * @param string $table     table to add fk constrains to
4687:      * @param string $table1    first reference table
4688:      * @param string $table2    second reference table
4689:      * @param string $property1 first reference column
4690:      * @param string $property2 second reference column
4691:      *
4692:      * @return boolean $success whether the constraint has been applied
4693:      */
4694:     protected function constrain( $table, $table1, $table2, $property1, $property2 )
4695:     {
4696:         $firstState  = $this->buildFK( $table, $table1, $property1, 'id', TRUE );
4697:         $secondState = $this->buildFK( $table, $table2, $property2, 'id', TRUE );
4698: 
4699:         return ( $firstState && $secondState );
4700:     }
4701: 
4702:     /**
4703:      * Constructor
4704:      *
4705:      * @param Adapter $adapter Database Adapter
4706:      */
4707:     public function __construct( Adapter $adapter )
4708:     {
4709:         $this->typeno_sqltype = array(
4710:             SQLiteT::C_DATATYPE_INTEGER => 'INTEGER',
4711:             SQLiteT::C_DATATYPE_NUMERIC => 'NUMERIC',
4712:             SQLiteT::C_DATATYPE_TEXT    => 'TEXT',
4713:         );
4714: 
4715:         $this->sqltype_typeno = array();
4716: 
4717:         foreach ( $this->typeno_sqltype as $k => $v ) {
4718:             $this->sqltype_typeno[$v] = $k;
4719:         }
4720: 
4721:         $this->adapter = $adapter;
4722:     }
4723: 
4724:     /**
4725:      * This method returns the datatype to be used for primary key IDS and
4726:      * foreign keys. Returns one if the data type constants.
4727:      *
4728:      * @return integer $const data type to be used for IDS.
4729:      */
4730:     public function getTypeForID()
4731:     {
4732:         return self::C_DATATYPE_INTEGER;
4733:     }
4734: 
4735:     /**
4736:      * @see QueryWriter::scanType
4737:      */
4738:     public function scanType( $value, $flagSpecial = FALSE )
4739:     {
4740:         $this->svalue = $value;
4741: 
4742:         if ( $value === FALSE ) return self::C_DATATYPE_INTEGER;
4743: 
4744:         if ( $value === NULL ) return self::C_DATATYPE_INTEGER;
4745: 
4746:         if ( $this->startsWithZeros( $value ) ) return self::C_DATATYPE_TEXT;
4747: 
4748:         if ( is_numeric( $value ) && ( intval( $value ) == $value ) && $value < 2147483648 ) return self::C_DATATYPE_INTEGER;
4749: 
4750:         if ( ( is_numeric( $value ) && $value < 2147483648 )
4751:             || preg_match( '/\d{4}\-\d\d\-\d\d/', $value )
4752:             || preg_match( '/\d{4}\-\d\d\-\d\d\s\d\d:\d\d:\d\d/', $value )
4753:         ) {
4754:             return self::C_DATATYPE_NUMERIC;
4755:         }
4756: 
4757:         return self::C_DATATYPE_TEXT;
4758:     }
4759: 
4760:     /**
4761:      * @see QueryWriter::addColumn
4762:      */
4763:     public function addColumn( $table, $column, $type )
4764:     {
4765:         $column = $this->check( $column );
4766:         $table  = $this->check( $table );
4767:         $type   = $this->typeno_sqltype[$type];
4768: 
4769:         $this->adapter->exec( "ALTER TABLE `$table` ADD `$column` $type " );
4770:     }
4771: 
4772:     /**
4773:      * @see QueryWriter::code
4774:      */
4775:     public function code( $typedescription, $includeSpecials = FALSE )
4776:     {
4777:         $r = ( ( isset( $this->sqltype_typeno[$typedescription] ) ) ? $this->sqltype_typeno[$typedescription] : 99 );
4778:         
4779:         return $r;
4780:     }
4781: 
4782:     /**
4783:      * @see QueryWriter::widenColumn
4784:      */
4785:     public function widenColumn( $type, $column, $datatype )
4786:     {
4787:         $t = $this->getTable( $type );
4788: 
4789:         $t['columns'][$column] = $this->typeno_sqltype[$datatype];
4790: 
4791:         $this->putTable( $t );
4792:     }
4793: 
4794:     /**
4795:      * @see QueryWriter::getTables();
4796:      */
4797:     public function getTables()
4798:     {
4799:         return $this->adapter->getCol( "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master
4800:             WHERE type='table' AND name!='sqlite_sequence';" );
4801:     }
4802: 
4803:     /**
4804:      * @see QueryWriter::createTable
4805:      */
4806:     public function createTable( $table )
4807:     {
4808:         $table = $this->esc( $table );
4809: 
4810:         $sql   = "CREATE TABLE $table ( id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT ) ";
4811: 
4812:         $this->adapter->exec( $sql );
4813:     }
4814: 
4815:     /**
4816:      * @see QueryWriter::getColumns
4817:      */
4818:     public function getColumns( $table )
4819:     {
4820:         $table      = $this->esc( $table, TRUE );
4821: 
4822:         $columnsRaw = $this->adapter->get( "PRAGMA table_info('$table')" );
4823: 
4824:         $columns    = array();
4825:         foreach ( $columnsRaw as $r ) $columns[$r['name']] = $r['type'];
4826: 
4827:         return $columns;
4828:     }
4829: 
4830:     /**
4831:      * @see QueryWriter::addUniqueIndex
4832:      */
4833:     public function addUniqueIndex( $type, $columns )
4834:     {
4835:         $name  = 'UQ_' . $this->esc( $type, TRUE ) . implode( '__', $columns );
4836: 
4837:         $t     = $this->getTable( $type );
4838: 
4839:         if ( isset( $t['indexes'][$name] ) ) return;
4840: 
4841:         $t['indexes'][$name] = array( 'name' => $name );
4842: 
4843:         $this->putTable( $t );
4844:     }
4845: 
4846:     /**
4847:      * @see QueryWriter::sqlStateIn
4848:      */
4849:     public function sqlStateIn( $state, $list )
4850:     {
4851:         $stateMap = array(
4852:             'HY000' => QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_NO_SUCH_TABLE,
4853:             '23000' => QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_INTEGRITY_CONSTRAINT_VIOLATION
4854:         );
4855: 
4856:         return in_array( ( isset( $stateMap[$state] ) ? $stateMap[$state] : '0' ), $list );
4857:     }
4858: 
4859:     /**
4860:      * @see QueryWriter::addIndex
4861:      */
4862:     public function addIndex( $type, $name, $column )
4863:     {
4864:         $table  = $type;
4865:         $table  = $this->esc( $table );
4866: 
4867:         $name   = preg_replace( '/\W/', '', $name );
4868:         $column = $this->esc( $column, TRUE );
4869: 
4870:         try {
4871:             
4872:             foreach ( $this->adapter->get( "PRAGMA INDEX_LIST($table) " ) as $ind ) {
4873:                 if ( $ind['name'] === $name ) return;
4874:             }
4875: 
4876:             $t = $this->getTable( $type );
4877:             $t['indexes'][$name] = array( 'name' => $column );
4878: 
4879:             $this->putTable( $t );
4880:         } catch( \Exception $exception ) {
4881:             //do nothing
4882:         }
4883:     }
4884: 
4885:     /**
4886:      * @see QueryWriter::wipe
4887:      */
4888:     public function wipe( $type )
4889:     {
4890:         $table = $this->esc( $type );
4891:         
4892:         $this->adapter->exec( "DELETE FROM $table " );
4893:     }
4894: 
4895:     /**
4896:      * @see QueryWriter::addFK
4897:      */
4898:     public function addFK( $type, $targetType, $field, $targetField, $isDep = FALSE )
4899:     {
4900:         return $this->buildFK( $type, $targetType, $field, $targetField, $isDep );
4901:     }
4902: 
4903:     /**
4904:      * @see QueryWriter::wipeAll
4905:      */
4906:     public function wipeAll()
4907:     {
4908:         $this->adapter->exec( 'PRAGMA foreign_keys = 0 ' );
4909: 
4910:         foreach ( $this->getTables() as $t ) {
4911:             try {
4912:                 $this->adapter->exec( "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `$t`" );
4913:             } catch (\Exception $e ) {
4914:             }
4915: 
4916:             try {
4917:                 $this->adapter->exec( "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `$t`" );
4918:             } catch (\Exception $e ) {
4919:             }
4920:         }
4921: 
4922:         $this->adapter->exec( 'PRAGMA foreign_keys = 1 ' );
4923:     }
4924: }
4925: } 
4926: 
4927: namespace RedBeanPHP\QueryWriter {
4928: 
4929: use RedBeanPHP\QueryWriter\AQueryWriter as AQueryWriter;
4930: use RedBeanPHP\QueryWriter as QueryWriter;
4931: use RedBeanPHP\Adapter\DBAdapter as DBAdapter;
4932: use RedBeanPHP\Adapter as Adapter;
4933: 
4934: /**
4935:  * RedBean PostgreSQL Query Writer
4936:  *
4937:  * @file    RedBean/QueryWriter/PostgreSQL.php
4938:  * @desc    QueryWriter for the PostgreSQL database system.
4939:  * @author  Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community
4940:  * @license BSD/GPLv2
4941:  *
4942:  * (c) copyright G.J.G.T. (Gabor) de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community.
4943:  * This source file is subject to the BSD/GPLv2 License that is bundled
4944:  * with this source code in the file license.txt.
4945:  */
4946: class PostgreSQL extends AQueryWriter implements QueryWriter
4947: {
4948:     /**
4949:      * Data types
4950:      */
4951:     const C_DATATYPE_INTEGER          = 0;
4952:     const C_DATATYPE_DOUBLE           = 1;
4953:     const C_DATATYPE_TEXT             = 3;
4954:     const C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_DATE     = 80;
4955:     const C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_DATETIME = 81;
4956:     const C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_POINT    = 90;
4957:     const C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_LSEG     = 91;
4958:     const C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_CIRCLE   = 92;
4959:     const C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_MONEY    = 93;
4960:     const C_DATATYPE_SPECIFIED        = 99;
4961: 
4962:     /**
4963:      * @var DBAdapter
4964:      */
4965:     protected $adapter;
4966: 
4967:     /**
4968:      * @var string
4969:      */
4970:     protected $quoteCharacter = '"';
4971: 
4972:     /**
4973:      * @var string
4974:      */
4975:     protected $defaultValue = 'DEFAULT';
4976: 
4977:     /**
4978:      * Returns the insert suffix SQL Snippet
4979:      *
4980:      * @param string $table table
4981:      *
4982:      * @return  string $sql SQL Snippet
4983:      */
4984:     protected function getInsertSuffix( $table )
4985:     {
4986:         return 'RETURNING id ';
4987:     }
4988: 
4989:     /**
4990:      * Add the constraints for a specific database driver: PostgreSQL.
4991:      *
4992:      * @param string $table     table to add fk constraints to
4993:      * @param string $table1    first reference table
4994:      * @param string $table2    second reference table
4995:      * @param string $property1 first reference column
4996:      * @param string $property2 second reference column
4997:      *
4998:      * @return boolean
4999:      */
5000:     protected function constrain( $table, $table1, $table2, $property1, $property2 )
5001:     {
5002:         try {
5003:             $adapter = $this->adapter;
5004: 
5005:             $fkCode  = 'fk' . md5( $table . $property1 . $property2 );
5006: 
5007:             $sql = "SELECT c.oid, n.nspname, c.relname,
5008:                 n2.nspname, c2.relname, cons.conname
5009:                 FROM pg_class c
5010:                 JOIN pg_namespace n ON n.oid = c.relnamespace
5011:                 LEFT OUTER JOIN pg_constraint cons ON cons.conrelid = c.oid
5012:                 LEFT OUTER JOIN pg_class c2 ON cons.confrelid = c2.oid
5013:                 LEFT OUTER JOIN pg_namespace n2 ON n2.oid = c2.relnamespace
5014:                 WHERE c.relkind = 'r'
5015:                     AND n.nspname IN ('public')
5016:                     AND (cons.contype = 'f' OR cons.contype IS NULL)
5017:                     AND (  cons.conname = '{$fkCode}a'  OR  cons.conname = '{$fkCode}b' )
5018:             ";
5019: 
5020:             $rows    = $adapter->get( $sql );
5021:             if ( !count( $rows ) ) {
5022:                 $sql1 = "ALTER TABLE \"$table\" ADD CONSTRAINT
5023:                     {$fkCode}a FOREIGN KEY ($property1)
5024:                     REFERENCES \"$table1\" (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ";
5025: 
5026:                 $sql2 = "ALTER TABLE \"$table\" ADD CONSTRAINT
5027:                     {$fkCode}b FOREIGN KEY ($property2)
5028:                     REFERENCES \"$table2\" (id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ";
5029: 
5030:                 $adapter->exec( $sql1 );
5031: 
5032:                 $adapter->exec( $sql2 );
5033:                 return TRUE;
5034:             }
5035: 
5036:             return FALSE;
5037:         } catch (\Exception $e ) {
5038:             return FALSE;
5039:         }
5040:     }
5041: 
5042:     /**
5043:      * Constructor
5044:      *
5045:      * @param Adapter $adapter Database Adapter
5046:      */
5047:     public function __construct( Adapter $adapter )
5048:     {
5049:         $this->typeno_sqltype = array(
5050:             self::C_DATATYPE_INTEGER          => ' integer ',
5051:             self::C_DATATYPE_DOUBLE           => ' double precision ',
5052:             self::C_DATATYPE_TEXT             => ' text ',
5053:             self::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_DATE     => ' date ',
5054:             self::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_DATETIME => ' timestamp without time zone ',
5055:             self::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_POINT    => ' point ',
5056:             self::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_LSEG     => ' lseg ',
5057:             self::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_CIRCLE   => ' circle ',
5058:             self::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_MONEY    => ' money ',
5059:         );
5060: 
5061:         $this->sqltype_typeno = array();
5062: 
5063:         foreach ( $this->typeno_sqltype as $k => $v ) {
5064:             $this->sqltype_typeno[trim( strtolower( $v ) )] = $k;
5065:         }
5066: 
5067:         $this->adapter = $adapter;
5068:     }
5069: 
5070:     /**
5071:      * This method returns the datatype to be used for primary key IDS and
5072:      * foreign keys. Returns one if the data type constants.
5073:      *
5074:      * @return integer $const data type to be used for IDS.
5075:      */
5076:     public function getTypeForID()
5077:     {
5078:         return self::C_DATATYPE_INTEGER;
5079:     }
5080: 
5081:     /**
5082:      * @see QueryWriter::getTables
5083:      */
5084:     public function getTables()
5085:     {
5086:         return $this->adapter->getCol( "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'public'" );
5087:     }
5088: 
5089:     /**
5090:      * @see QueryWriter::createTable
5091:      */
5092:     public function createTable( $table )
5093:     {
5094:         $table = $this->esc( $table );
5095: 
5096:         $this->adapter->exec( " CREATE TABLE $table (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY); " );
5097:     }
5098: 
5099:     /**
5100:      * @see QueryWriter::getColumns
5101:      */
5102:     public function getColumns( $table )
5103:     {
5104:         $table      = $this->esc( $table, TRUE );
5105: 
5106:         $columnsRaw = $this->adapter->get( "SELECT column_name, data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name='$table'" );
5107: 
5108:         $columns = array();
5109:         foreach ( $columnsRaw as $r ) {
5110:             $columns[$r['column_name']] = $r['data_type'];
5111:         }
5112: 
5113:         return $columns;
5114:     }
5115: 
5116:     /**
5117:      * @see QueryWriter::scanType
5118:      */
5119:     public function scanType( $value, $flagSpecial = FALSE )
5120:     {
5121:         $this->svalue = $value;
5122: 
5123:         if ( $flagSpecial && $value ) {
5124:             if ( preg_match( '/^\d{4}\-\d\d-\d\d$/', $value ) ) {
5125:                 return PostgreSQL::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_DATE;
5126:             }
5127: 
5128:             if ( preg_match( '/^\d{4}\-\d\d-\d\d\s\d\d:\d\d:\d\d(\.\d{1,6})?$/', $value ) ) {
5129:                 return PostgreSQL::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_DATETIME;
5130:             }
5131: 
5132:             if ( preg_match( '/^\([\d\.]+,[\d\.]+\)$/', $value ) ) {
5133:                 return PostgreSQL::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_POINT;
5134:             }
5135: 
5136:             if ( preg_match( '/^\[\([\d\.]+,[\d\.]+\),\([\d\.]+,[\d\.]+\)\]$/', $value ) ) {
5137:                 return PostgreSQL::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_LSEG;
5138:             }
5139: 
5140:             if ( preg_match( '/^\<\([\d\.]+,[\d\.]+\),[\d\.]+\>$/', $value ) ) {
5141:                 return PostgreSQL::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_CIRCLE;
5142:             }
5143: 
5144:             if ( preg_match( '/^\-?\$[\d,\.]+$/', $value ) ) {
5145:                 return PostgreSQL::C_DATATYPE_SPECIAL_MONEY;
5146:             }
5147:         }
5148: 
5149:         $sz = ( $this->startsWithZeros( $value ) );
5150: 
5151:         if ( $sz ) {
5152:             return self::C_DATATYPE_TEXT;
5153:         }
5154: 
5155:         if ( $value === NULL || ( $value instanceof NULL ) || ( is_numeric( $value )
5156:                 && floor( $value ) == $value
5157:                 && $value < 2147483648
5158:                 && $value > -2147483648 )
5159:         ) {
5160:             return self::C_DATATYPE_INTEGER;
5161:         } elseif ( is_numeric( $value ) ) {
5162:             return self::C_DATATYPE_DOUBLE;
5163:         } else {
5164:             return self::C_DATATYPE_TEXT;
5165:         }
5166:     }
5167: 
5168:     /**
5169:      * @see QueryWriter::code
5170:      */
5171:     public function code( $typedescription, $includeSpecials = FALSE )
5172:     {
5173:         $r = ( isset( $this->sqltype_typeno[$typedescription] ) ) ? $this->sqltype_typeno[$typedescription] : 99;
5174: 
5175:         if ( $includeSpecials ) return $r;
5176: 
5177:         if ( $r >= QueryWriter::C_DATATYPE_RANGE_SPECIAL ) {
5178:             return self::C_DATATYPE_SPECIFIED;
5179:         }
5180: 
5181:         return $r;
5182:     }
5183: 
5184:     /**
5185:      * @see QueryWriter::widenColumn
5186:      */
5187:     public function widenColumn( $type, $column, $datatype )
5188:     {
5189:         $table   = $type;
5190:         $type    = $datatype;
5191: 
5192:         $table   = $this->esc( $table );
5193:         $column  = $this->esc( $column );
5194: 
5195:         $newtype = $this->typeno_sqltype[$type];
5196: 
5197:         $this->adapter->exec( "ALTER TABLE $table \n\t ALTER COLUMN $column TYPE $newtype " );
5198:     }
5199: 
5200:     /**
5201:      * @see QueryWriter::addUniqueIndex
5202:      */
5203:     public function addUniqueIndex( $table, $columns )
5204:     {
5205:         $table = $this->esc( $table, TRUE );
5206: 
5207:         sort( $columns ); //else we get multiple indexes due to order-effects
5208: 
5209:         foreach ( $columns as $k => $v ) {
5210:             $columns[$k] = $this->esc( $v );
5211:         }
5212: 
5213:         $r = $this->adapter->get( "SELECT i.relname AS index_name
5214:             FROM pg_class t,pg_class i,pg_index ix,pg_attribute a
5215:             WHERE t.oid = ix.indrelid
5216:                 AND i.oid = ix.indexrelid
5217:                 AND a.attrelid = t.oid
5218:                 AND a.attnum = ANY(ix.indkey)
5219:                 AND t.relkind = 'r'
5220:                 AND t.relname = '$table'
5221:             ORDER BY t.relname, i.relname;" );
5222: 
5223:         $name = "UQ_" . sha1( $table . implode( ',', $columns ) );
5224: 
5225:         if ( $r ) {
5226:             foreach ( $r as $i ) {
5227:                 if ( strtolower( $i['index_name'] ) == strtolower( $name ) ) {
5228:                     return;
5229:                 }
5230:             }
5231:         }
5232: 
5233:         $sql = "ALTER TABLE \"$table\"
5234:                 ADD CONSTRAINT $name UNIQUE (" . implode( ',', $columns ) . ")";
5235: 
5236:         $this->adapter->exec( $sql );
5237:     }
5238: 
5239:     /**
5240:      * @see QueryWriter::sqlStateIn
5241:      */
5242:     public function sqlStateIn( $state, $list )
5243:     {
5244:         $stateMap = array(
5245:             '42P01' => QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_NO_SUCH_TABLE,
5246:             '42703' => QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_NO_SUCH_COLUMN,
5247:             '23505' => QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_INTEGRITY_CONSTRAINT_VIOLATION
5248:         );
5249: 
5250:         return in_array( ( isset( $stateMap[$state] ) ? $stateMap[$state] : '0' ), $list );
5251:     }
5252: 
5253:     /**
5254:      * @see QueryWriter::addIndex
5255:      */
5256:     public function addIndex( $type, $name, $column )
5257:     {
5258:         $table  = $type;
5259:         $table  = $this->esc( $table );
5260: 
5261:         $name   = preg_replace( '/\W/', '', $name );
5262:         $column = $this->esc( $column );
5263: 
5264:         if ( $this->adapter->getCell( "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pg_class WHERE relname = '$name'" ) ) {
5265:             return;
5266:         }
5267: 
5268:         try {
5269:             $this->adapter->exec( "CREATE INDEX $name ON $table ($column) " );
5270:         } catch (\Exception $e ) {
5271:             //do nothing
5272:         }
5273:     }
5274: 
5275:     /**
5276:      * @see QueryWriter::addFK
5277:      */
5278:     public function addFK( $type, $targetType, $field, $targetField, $isDep = FALSE )
5279:     {
5280:         $db = $this->adapter->getCell( 'SELECT current_database()' );
5281:         $cfks = $this->adapter->getCell('
5282:             SELECT constraint_name
5283:                 FROM information_schema.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE
5284:             WHERE 
5285:                 table_catalog = ?
5286:                 AND table_schema = \'public\' 
5287:                 AND table_name = ? 
5288:                 AND column_name = ?
5289:         ', array($db, $type, $field));
5290:         
5291:         try{
5292:             if (!$cfks) {
5293:                 $delRule = ( $isDep ? 'CASCADE' : 'SET NULL' );
5294:                 $this->adapter->exec( "ALTER TABLE  {$this->esc($type)}
5295:                     ADD FOREIGN KEY ( {$this->esc($field)} ) REFERENCES  {$this->esc($targetType)} (
5296:                     {$this->esc($targetField)}) ON DELETE $delRule ON UPDATE $delRule DEFERRABLE ;" );
5297:             }
5298:         } catch (\Exception $e ) {
5299:             return FALSE;
5300:         }
5301:     }
5302: 
5303:     /**
5304:      * @see QueryWriter::wipeAll
5305:      */
5306:     public function wipeAll()
5307:     {
5308:         $this->adapter->exec( 'SET CONSTRAINTS ALL DEFERRED' );
5309: 
5310:         foreach ( $this->getTables() as $t ) {
5311:             $t = $this->esc( $t );
5312: 
5313:             $this->adapter->exec( "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS $t CASCADE " );
5314:         }
5315: 
5316:         $this->adapter->exec( 'SET CONSTRAINTS ALL IMMEDIATE' );
5317:     }
5318: 
5319: }
5320: } 
5321: 
5322: namespace RedBeanPHP {
5323: 
5324: /**
5325:  * RedBean\Exception Base
5326:  *
5327:  * @file    RedBean/Exception.php
5328:  * @desc    Represents the base class for RedBean\Exceptions
5329:  * @author  Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community
5330:  * @license BSD/GPLv2
5331:  *
5332:  * copyright (c) G.J.G.T. (Gabor) de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community
5333:  * This source file is subject to the BSD/GPLv2 License that is bundled
5334:  * with this source code in the file license.txt.
5335:  */
5336: class RedException extends \Exception
5337: {
5338: }
5339: }
5340: 
5341: namespace RedBeanPHP\RedException {
5342: 
5343: use RedBeanPHP\RedException as RedException;
5344: 
5345: /**
5346:  * RedBean\Exception SQL
5347:  *
5348:  * @file       RedBean/Exception/SQL.php
5349:  * @desc       Represents a generic database exception independent of the underlying driver.
5350:  * @author     Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community
5351:  * @license    BSD/GPLv2
5352:  *
5353:  * (c) copyright G.J.G.T. (Gabor) de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community.
5354:  * This source file is subject to the BSD/GPLv2 License that is bundled
5355:  * with this source code in the file license.txt.
5356:  */
5357: class SQL extends RedException
5358: {
5359: 
5360:     /**
5361:      * @var string
5362:      */
5363:     private $sqlState;
5364: 
5365:     /**
5366:      * Returns an ANSI-92 compliant SQL state.
5367:      *
5368:      * @return string $state ANSI state code
5369:      */
5370:     public function getSQLState()
5371:     {
5372:         return $this->sqlState;
5373:     }
5374: 
5375:     /**
5376:      * @todo parse state to verify valid ANSI92!
5377:      *       Stores ANSI-92 compliant SQL state.
5378:      *
5379:      * @param string $sqlState code
5380:      *
5381:      * @return void
5382:      */
5383:     public function setSQLState( $sqlState )
5384:     {
5385:         $this->sqlState = $sqlState;
5386:     }
5387: 
5388:     /**
5389:      * To String prints both code and SQL state.
5390:      *
5391:      * @return string $message prints this exception instance as a string
5392:      */
5393:     public function __toString()
5394:     {
5395:         return '[' . $this->getSQLState() . '] - ' . $this->getMessage()."\n".
5396:                 'trace: ' . $this->getTraceAsString();
5397:     }
5398: }
5399: } 
5400: 
5401: namespace RedBeanPHP {
5402: 
5403: use RedBeanPHP\OODBBean as OODBBean;
5404: use RedBeanPHP\Observable as Observable;
5405: use RedBeanPHP\Adapter\DBAdapter as DBAdapter;
5406: use RedBeanPHP\BeanHelper\FacadeBeanHelper as FacadeBeanHelper;
5407: use RedBeanPHP\AssociationManager as AssociationManager;
5408: use RedBeanPHP\QueryWriter as QueryWriter;
5409: use RedBeanPHP\RedException\Security as Security;
5410: use RedBeanPHP\SimpleModel as SimpleModel;
5411: use RedBeanPHP\BeanHelper as BeanHelper;
5412: use RedBeanPHP\RedException\SQL as SQL;
5413: use RedBeanPHP\QueryWriter\AQueryWriter as AQueryWriter;
5414: 
5415: /**
5416:  * RedBean Object Oriented DataBase
5417:  *
5418:  * @file    RedBean/OODB.php
5419:  * @desc    RedBean Object Database
5420:  * @author  Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP community
5421:  * @license BSD/GPLv2
5422:  *
5423:  * The RedBean OODB Class is the main class of RedBeanPHP.
5424:  * It takes OODBBean objects and stores them to and loads them from the
5425:  * database as well as providing other CRUD functions. This class acts as a
5426:  * object database.
5427:  *
5428:  * copyright (c) G.J.G.T. (Gabor) de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community
5429:  * This source file is subject to the BSD/GPLv2 License that is bundled
5430:  * with this source code in the file license.txt.
5431:  */
5432: class OODB extends Observable
5433: {
5434: 
5435:     /**
5436:      * @var array
5437:      */
5438:     protected $chillList = array();
5439: 
5440:     
5441:     /**
5442:      * @var array
5443:      */
5444:     protected $stash = NULL;
5445: 
5446:     /*
5447:      * @var integer
5448:      */
5449:     protected $nesting = 0;
5450: 
5451:     /**
5452:      * @var DBAdapter
5453:      */
5454:     protected $writer;
5455: 
5456:     /**
5457:      * @var boolean
5458:      */
5459:     protected $isFrozen = FALSE;
5460: 
5461:     /**
5462:      * @var FacadeBeanHelper
5463:      */
5464:     protected $beanhelper = NULL;
5465: 
5466:     /**
5467:      * @var AssociationManager
5468:      */
5469:     protected $assocManager = NULL;
5470: 
5471:     /**
5472:      * Handles\Exceptions. Suppresses exceptions caused by missing structures.
5473:      *
5474:      * @param\Exception $exception exception
5475:      *
5476:      * @return void
5477:      *
5478:      * @throws\Exception
5479:      */
5480:     private function handleException(\Exception $exception )
5481:     {
5482:         if ( $this->isFrozen || !$this->writer->sqlStateIn( $exception->getSQLState(),
5483:             array(
5484:                 QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_NO_SUCH_TABLE,
5485:                 QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_NO_SUCH_COLUMN ) )
5486:         ) {
5487:             throw $exception;
5488:         }
5489:     }
5490: 
5491:     /**
5492:      * Unboxes a bean from a FUSE model if needed and checks whether the bean is
5493:      * an instance of OODBBean.
5494:      *
5495:      * @param OODBBean $bean bean you wish to unbox
5496:      *
5497:      * @return OODBBean
5498:      *
5499:      * @throws Security
5500:      */
5501:     private function unboxIfNeeded( $bean )
5502:     {
5503:         if ( $bean instanceof SimpleModel ) {
5504:             $bean = $bean->unbox();
5505:         }
5506:         if ( !( $bean instanceof OODBBean ) ) {
5507:             throw new RedException( 'OODB Store requires a bean, got: ' . gettype( $bean ) );
5508:         }
5509: 
5510:         return $bean;
5511:     }
5512: 
5513:     /**
5514:      * Process groups. Internal function. Processes different kind of groups for
5515:      * storage function. Given a list of original beans and a list of current beans,
5516:      * this function calculates which beans remain in the list (residue), which
5517:      * have been deleted (are in the trashcan) and which beans have been added
5518:      * (additions).
5519:      *
5520:      * @param  array $originals originals
5521:      * @param  array $current   the current beans
5522:      * @param  array $additions beans that have been added
5523:      * @param  array $trashcan  beans that have been deleted
5524:      * @param  array $residue   beans that have been left untouched
5525:      *
5526:      * @return array
5527:      */
5528:     private function processGroups( $originals, $current, $additions, $trashcan, $residue )
5529:     {
5530:         return array(
5531:             array_merge( $additions, array_diff( $current, $originals ) ),
5532:             array_merge( $trashcan, array_diff( $originals, $current ) ),
5533:             array_merge( $residue, array_intersect( $current, $originals ) )
5534:         );
5535:     }
5536: 
5537:     /**
5538:      * Figures out the desired type given the cast string ID.
5539:      *
5540:      * @param string $cast cast identifier
5541:      *
5542:      * @return integer
5543:      *
5544:      * @throws Security
5545:      */
5546:     private function getTypeFromCast( $cast )
5547:     {
5548:         if ( $cast == 'string' ) {
5549:             $typeno = $this->writer->scanType( 'STRING' );
5550:         } elseif ( $cast == 'id' ) {
5551:             $typeno = $this->writer->getTypeForID();
5552:         } elseif ( isset( $this->writer->sqltype_typeno[$cast] ) ) {
5553:             $typeno = $this->writer->sqltype_typeno[$cast];
5554:         } else {
5555:             throw new RedException( 'Invalid Cast' );
5556:         }
5557: 
5558:         return $typeno;
5559:     }
5560: 
5561:     /**
5562:      * Processes an embedded bean.
5563:      *
5564:      * @param OODBBean|SimpleModel $embeddedBean the bean or model
5565:      *
5566:      * @return integer
5567:      */
5568:     private function prepareEmbeddedBean( $embeddedBean )
5569:     {
5570:         if ( !$embeddedBean->id || $embeddedBean->getMeta( 'tainted' ) ) {
5571:             $this->store( $embeddedBean );
5572:         }
5573: 
5574:         return $embeddedBean->id;
5575:     }
5576: 
5577:     /**
5578:      * Orders the Query Writer to create a table if it does not exist already and
5579:      * adds a note in the build report about the creation.
5580:      *
5581:      * @param OODBBean $bean  bean to update report of
5582:      * @param string           $table table to check and create if not exists
5583:      *
5584:      * @return void
5585:      */
5586:     private function createTableIfNotExists( OODBBean $bean, $table )
5587:     {
5588:         //Does table exist? If not, create
5589:         if ( !$this->isFrozen && !$this->tableExists( $this->writer->esc( $table, TRUE ) ) ) {
5590:             $this->writer->createTable( $table );
5591:             $bean->setMeta( 'buildreport.flags.created', TRUE );
5592:         }
5593:     }
5594: 
5595:     /**
5596:      * Adds the unique constraints described in the meta data.
5597:      *
5598:      * @param OODBBean $bean bean
5599:      *
5600:      * @return void
5601:      */
5602:     private function addUniqueConstraints( OODBBean $bean )
5603:     {
5604:         if ( $uniques = $bean->getMeta( 'buildcommand.unique' ) ) {
5605:             $table = $bean->getMeta( 'type' );
5606:             foreach ( $uniques as $unique ) {
5607:                 if ( !$this->isChilled($table) ) $this->writer->addUniqueIndex( $table, $unique );
5608:             }
5609:         }
5610:     }
5611: 
5612:     /**
5613:      * Stores a cleaned bean; i.e. only scalar values. This is the core of the store()
5614:      * method. When all lists and embedded beans (parent objects) have been processed and
5615:      * removed from the original bean the bean is passed to this method to be stored
5616:      * in the database.
5617:      *
5618:      * @param OODBBean $bean the clean bean
5619:      *
5620:      * @return void
5621:      */
5622:     private function storeBean( OODBBean $bean )
5623:     {
5624:         if ( $bean->getMeta( 'tainted' ) ) {
5625:             if ( !$this->isFrozen ) {
5626:                 $this->check( $bean );
5627:                 $table = $bean->getMeta( 'type' );
5628:                 $this->createTableIfNotExists( $bean, $table );
5629:                 $updateValues = $this->getUpdateValues( $bean );            
5630:                 $this->addUniqueConstraints( $bean );
5631:                 $bean->id = $this->writer->updateRecord( $table, $updateValues, $bean->id );
5632:                 $bean->setMeta( 'tainted', FALSE );
5633:             } else {
5634:                 list( $properties, $table ) = $bean->getPropertiesAndType();
5635:                 $id = $properties['id'];
5636:                 unset($properties['id']);
5637:                 $updateValues = array();
5638:                 $k1 = 'property';
5639:                 $k2 = 'value';
5640:                 foreach( $properties as $key => $value ) {
5641:                     $updateValues[] = array( $k1 => $key, $k2 => $value );
5642:                 }
5643:                 $bean->id = $this->writer->updateRecord( $table, $updateValues, $id );
5644:                 $bean->setMeta( 'tainted', FALSE );
5645:             }
5646:         }
5647:     }
5648: 
5649:     /**
5650:      * Returns a structured array of update values using the following format:
5651:      * array(
5652:      *        property => $property,
5653:      *        value => $value
5654:      * );
5655:      *
5656:      * @param OODBBean $bean bean to extract update values from
5657:      *
5658:      * @return array
5659:      */
5660:     private function getUpdateValues( OODBBean $bean )
5661:     {
5662:         $updateValues = array();
5663:         foreach ( $bean as $property => $value ) {
5664:             if ( !$this->isFrozen && $property !== 'id' ) {
5665:                 $this->moldTable( $bean, $property, $value );
5666:             }
5667:             if ( $property !== 'id' ) {
5668:                 $updateValues[] = array( 'property' => $property, 'value' => $value );
5669:             }
5670:         }
5671: 
5672:         return $updateValues;
5673:     }
5674: 
5675:     /**
5676:      * Molds the table to fit the bean data.
5677:      * Given a property and a value and the bean, this method will
5678:      * adjust the table structure to fit the requirements of the property and value.
5679:      * This may include adding a new column or widening an existing column to hold a larger
5680:      * or different kind of value. This method employs the writer to adjust the table
5681:      * structure in the database. Schema updates are recorded in meta properties of the bean.
5682:      *
5683:      * @param OODBBean $bean     bean to get cast data from and store meta in
5684:      * @param string           $property property to store
5685:      * @param mixed            $value    value to store
5686:      *
5687:      * @return void
5688:      */
5689:     private function moldTable( OODBBean $bean, $property, $value )
5690:     {
5691:         $table   = $bean->getMeta( 'type' );
5692:         $columns = $this->writer->getColumns( $table );
5693:         if ( !in_array( $bean->getMeta( 'type' ), $this->chillList ) ) {
5694:             if ( $bean->getMeta( "cast.$property", -1 ) !== -1 ) { //check for explicitly specified types
5695:                 $cast   = $bean->getMeta( "cast.$property" );
5696:                 $typeno = $this->getTypeFromCast( $cast );
5697:             } else {
5698:                 $cast   = FALSE;
5699:                 $typeno = $this->writer->scanType( $value, TRUE );
5700:             }
5701:             if ( isset( $columns[$this->writer->esc( $property, TRUE )] ) ) { //Is this property represented in the table ?
5702:                 if ( !$cast ) { //rescan without taking into account special types >80
5703:                     $typeno = $this->writer->scanType( $value, FALSE );
5704:                 }
5705:                 $sqlt = $this->writer->code( $columns[$this->writer->esc( $property, TRUE )] );
5706:                 if ( $typeno > $sqlt ) { //no, we have to widen the database column type
5707:                     $this->writer->widenColumn( $table, $property, $typeno );
5708:                     $bean->setMeta( 'buildreport.flags.widen', TRUE );
5709:                 }
5710:             } else {
5711:                 $this->writer->addColumn( $table, $property, $typeno );
5712:                 $bean->setMeta( 'buildreport.flags.addcolumn', TRUE );
5713:                 $this->processBuildCommands( $table, $property, $bean );
5714:             }
5715:         }
5716:     }
5717: 
5718:     /**
5719:      * Processes a list of beans from a bean. A bean may contain lists. This
5720:      * method handles shared addition lists; i.e. the $bean->sharedObject properties.
5721:      *
5722:      * @param OODBBean $bean             the bean
5723:      * @param array            $sharedAdditions  list with shared additions
5724:      *
5725:      * @return void
5726:      *
5727:      * @throws Security
5728:      */
5729:     private function processSharedAdditions( $bean, $sharedAdditions )
5730:     {
5731:         foreach ( $sharedAdditions as $addition ) {
5732:             if ( $addition instanceof OODBBean ) {
5733:                 $this->assocManager->associate( $addition, $bean );
5734:             } else {
5735:                 throw new RedException( 'Array may only contain OODBBeans' );
5736:             }
5737:         }
5738:     }
5739: 
5740:     /**
5741:      * Processes a list of beans from a bean. A bean may contain lists. This
5742:      * method handles own lists; i.e. the $bean->ownObject properties.
5743:      * A residue is a bean in an own-list that stays where it is. This method
5744:      * checks if there have been any modification to this bean, in that case
5745:      * the bean is stored once again, otherwise the bean will be left untouched.
5746:      *
5747:      * @param OODBBean $bean       the bean
5748:      * @param array            $ownresidue list
5749:      *
5750:      * @return void
5751:      */
5752:     private function processResidue( $ownresidue )
5753:     {
5754:         foreach ( $ownresidue as $residue ) {
5755:             if ( $residue->getMeta( 'tainted' ) ) {
5756:                 $this->store( $residue );
5757:             }
5758:         }
5759:     }
5760: 
5761:     /**
5762:      * Processes a list of beans from a bean. A bean may contain lists. This
5763:      * method handles own lists; i.e. the $bean->ownObject properties.
5764:      * A trash can bean is a bean in an own-list that has been removed
5765:      * (when checked with the shadow). This method
5766:      * checks if the bean is also in the dependency list. If it is the bean will be removed.
5767:      * If not, the connection between the bean and the owner bean will be broken by
5768:      * setting the ID to NULL.
5769:      *
5770:      * @param OODBBean $bean        the bean
5771:      * @param array            $ownTrashcan list
5772:      *
5773:      * @return void
5774:      */
5775:     private function processTrashcan( $bean, $ownTrashcan )
5776:     {
5777:         
5778:         foreach ( $ownTrashcan as $trash ) {
5779:             
5780:             $myFieldLink = $bean->getMeta( 'type' ) . '_id';
5781:             $alias = $bean->getMeta( 'sys.alias.' . $trash->getMeta( 'type' ) );
5782:             if ( $alias ) $myFieldLink = $alias . '_id';
5783:             
5784:             if ( $trash->getMeta( 'sys.garbage' ) === true ) {
5785:                 $this->trash( $trash );
5786:             } else {
5787:                 $trash->$myFieldLink = NULL;
5788:                 $this->store( $trash );
5789:             }
5790:         }
5791:     }
5792: 
5793:     /**
5794:      * Unassociates the list items in the trashcan.
5795:      *
5796:      * @param OODBBean $bean           bean
5797:      * @param array            $sharedTrashcan list
5798:      *
5799:      * @return void
5800:      */
5801:     private function processSharedTrashcan( $bean, $sharedTrashcan )
5802:     {
5803:         foreach ( $sharedTrashcan as $trash ) {
5804:             $this->assocManager->unassociate( $trash, $bean );
5805:         }
5806:     }
5807: 
5808:     /**
5809:      * Stores all the beans in the residue group.
5810:      *
5811:      * @param OODBBean $bean          bean
5812:      * @param array            $sharedresidue list
5813:      *
5814:      * @return void
5815:      */
5816:     private function processSharedResidue( $bean, $sharedresidue )
5817:     {
5818:         foreach ( $sharedresidue as $residue ) {
5819:             $this->store( $residue );
5820:         }
5821:     }
5822: 
5823:     /**
5824:      * Processes embedded beans.
5825:      * Each embedded bean will be indexed and foreign keys will
5826:      * be created if the bean is in the dependency list.
5827:      *
5828:      * @param OODBBean $bean          bean
5829:      * @param array            $embeddedBeans embedded beans
5830:      *
5831:      * @return void
5832:      */
5833:     private function addForeignKeysForParentBeans( $bean, $embeddedBeans )
5834:     {
5835:         $cachedIndex = array();
5836:         foreach ( $embeddedBeans as $linkField => $embeddedBean ) {
5837:             $beanType = $bean->getMeta( 'type' );
5838:             $embeddedType = $embeddedBean->getMeta( 'type' );
5839:             $key = $beanType . '|' . $embeddedType . '>' . $linkField;
5840:             if ( !isset( $cachedIndex[$key] ) ) {
5841:                 $this->writer->addIndex( $bean->getMeta( 'type' ),
5842:                 'index_foreignkey_' . $beanType . '_' . $embeddedType,
5843:                 $linkField );
5844:                 $this->writer->addFK( $beanType, $embeddedType, $linkField, 'id', FALSE );
5845:                 $cachedIndex[$key] = TRUE;
5846:             }   
5847:         }
5848:     }
5849: 
5850:     /**
5851:      * Part of the store() functionality.
5852:      * Handles all new additions after the bean has been saved.
5853:      * Stores addition bean in own-list, extracts the id and
5854:      * adds a foreign key. Also adds a constraint in case the type is
5855:      * in the dependent list.
5856:      *
5857:      * @param OODBBean $bean         bean
5858:      * @param array            $ownAdditions list of addition beans in own-list
5859:      *
5860:      * @return void
5861:      *
5862:      * @throws Security
5863:      */
5864:     private function processAdditions( $bean, $ownAdditions )
5865:     {
5866:         $beanType = $bean->getMeta( 'type' );
5867:         
5868:         $cachedIndex = array();
5869:         foreach ( $ownAdditions as $addition ) {
5870:             if ( $addition instanceof OODBBean ) {
5871:                 
5872:                 $myFieldLink = $beanType . '_id';
5873:                 $alias = $bean->getMeta( 'sys.alias.' . $addition->getMeta( 'type' ) );
5874:                 if ( $alias ) $myFieldLink = $alias . '_id';
5875:         
5876:                 $addition->$myFieldLink = $bean->id;
5877:                 $addition->setMeta( 'cast.' . $myFieldLink, 'id' );
5878:                 $this->store( $addition );
5879:                 if ( !$this->isFrozen ) {
5880:                     $additionType = $addition->getMeta( 'type' );
5881:                     $key = $additionType . '|' . $beanType . '>' . $myFieldLink;
5882:                     if ( !isset( $cachedIndex[$key] ) ) {
5883:                         $this->writer->addIndex( $additionType,
5884:                         'index_foreignkey_' . $additionType . '_' . $beanType,
5885:                         $myFieldLink );
5886:                         $isDep = $bean->getMeta( 'sys.exclusive-'.$additionType );
5887:                         $this->writer->addFK( $additionType, $beanType, $myFieldLink, 'id', $isDep );
5888:                         $cachedIndex[$key] = TRUE;
5889:                     }
5890:                 }
5891:             } else {
5892:                 throw new RedException( 'Array may only contain OODBBeans' );
5893:             }
5894:         }
5895:     }
5896: 
5897:     /**
5898:      * Determines whether the bean has 'loaded lists' or
5899:      * 'loaded embedded beans' that need to be processed
5900:      * by the store() method.
5901:      *
5902:      * @param OODBBean $bean bean to be examined
5903:      *
5904:      * @return boolean
5905:      */
5906:     private function hasListsOrObjects( OODBBean $bean )
5907:     {
5908:         $processLists = FALSE;
5909:         foreach ( $bean as $value ) {
5910:             if ( is_array( $value ) || is_object( $value ) ) {
5911:                 $processLists = TRUE;
5912:                 break;
5913:             }
5914:         }
5915: 
5916:         return $processLists;
5917:     }
5918: 
5919:     /**
5920:      * Processes all column based build commands.
5921:      * A build command is an additional instruction for the Query Writer. It is processed only when
5922:      * a column gets created. The build command is often used to instruct the writer to write some
5923:      * extra SQL to create indexes or constraints. Build commands are stored in meta data of the bean.
5924:      * They are only for internal use, try to refrain from using them in your code directly.
5925:      *
5926:      * @param  string           $table    name of the table to process build commands for
5927:      * @param  string           $property name of the property to process build commands for
5928:      * @param  OODBBean $bean     bean that contains the build commands
5929:      *
5930:      * @return void
5931:      */
5932:     private function processBuildCommands( $table, $property, OODBBean $bean )
5933:     {
5934:         if ( $inx = ( $bean->getMeta( 'buildcommand.indexes' ) ) ) {
5935:             if ( isset( $inx[$property] ) ) {
5936:                 $this->writer->addIndex( $table, $inx[$property], $property );
5937:             }
5938:         }
5939:     }
5940: 
5941:     /**
5942:      * Converts an embedded bean to an ID, removed the bean property and
5943:      * stores the bean in the embedded beans array.
5944:      *
5945:      * @param array            $embeddedBeans destination array for embedded bean
5946:      * @param OODBBean $bean          target bean
5947:      * @param string           $property      property that contains the embedded bean
5948:      * @param OODBBean $value         embedded bean itself
5949:      */
5950:     private function processEmbeddedBean( &$embeddedBeans, $bean, $property, OODBBean $value )
5951:     {
5952:         $linkField        = $property . '_id';
5953:         $bean->$linkField = $this->prepareEmbeddedBean( $value );
5954:         $bean->setMeta( 'cast.' . $linkField, 'id' );
5955:         $embeddedBeans[$linkField] = $value;
5956:         unset( $bean->$property );
5957:     }
5958: 
5959:     /**
5960:      * Stores a bean and its lists in one run.
5961:      *
5962:      * @param OODBBean $bean
5963:      *
5964:      * @return void
5965:      */
5966:     private function processLists( OODBBean $bean )
5967:     {
5968:         $sharedAdditions = $sharedTrashcan = $sharedresidue = $sharedItems = $ownAdditions = $ownTrashcan = $ownresidue = $embeddedBeans = array(); //Define groups
5969:         foreach ( $bean as $property => $value ) {
5970:             $value = ( $value instanceof SimpleModel ) ? $value->unbox() : $value;
5971:             if ( $value instanceof OODBBean ) {
5972:                 $this->processEmbeddedBean( $embeddedBeans, $bean, $property, $value );
5973:             } elseif ( is_array( $value ) ) {
5974:                 $originals = $bean->getMeta( 'sys.shadow.' . $property, array() );
5975:                 $bean->setMeta( 'sys.shadow.' . $property, NULL ); //clear shadow
5976:                 if ( strpos( $property, 'own' ) === 0 ) {
5977:                     list( $ownAdditions, $ownTrashcan, $ownresidue ) = $this->processGroups( $originals, $value, $ownAdditions, $ownTrashcan, $ownresidue );
5978:                     $listName = lcfirst( substr( $property, 3 ) );
5979:                     if ($bean->getMeta( 'sys.exclusive-'.  $listName ) ) {
5980:                         OODBBean::setMetaAll( $ownTrashcan, 'sys.garbage', TRUE );
5981:                     }
5982:                     unset( $bean->$property );
5983:                 } elseif ( strpos( $property, 'shared' ) === 0 ) {
5984:                     list( $sharedAdditions, $sharedTrashcan, $sharedresidue ) = $this->processGroups( $originals, $value, $sharedAdditions, $sharedTrashcan, $sharedresidue );
5985:                     unset( $bean->$property );
5986:                 }
5987:             }
5988:         }
5989:         $this->storeBean( $bean );
5990:         if ( !$this->isFrozen ) {
5991:             $this->addForeignKeysForParentBeans( $bean, $embeddedBeans );
5992:         }
5993:         $this->processTrashcan( $bean, $ownTrashcan );
5994:         $this->processAdditions( $bean, $ownAdditions );
5995:         $this->processResidue( $ownresidue );
5996:         $this->processSharedTrashcan( $bean, $sharedTrashcan );
5997:         $this->processSharedAdditions( $bean, $sharedAdditions );
5998:         $this->processSharedResidue( $bean, $sharedresidue );
5999:     }
6000: 
6001:     /**
6002:      * Constructor, requires a query writer.
6003:      *
6004:      * @param QueryWriter $writer writer
6005:      */
6006:     public function __construct( QueryWriter $writer )
6007:     {
6008:         if ( $writer instanceof QueryWriter ) {
6009:             $this->writer = $writer;
6010:         }
6011:     }
6012: 
6013:     /**
6014:      * Toggles fluid or frozen mode. In fluid mode the database
6015:      * structure is adjusted to accomodate your objects. In frozen mode
6016:      * this is not the case.
6017:      *
6018:      * You can also pass an array containing a selection of frozen types.
6019:      * Let's call this chilly mode, it's just like fluid mode except that
6020:      * certain types (i.e. tables) aren't touched.
6021:      *
6022:      * @param boolean|array $toggle TRUE if you want to use OODB instance in frozen mode
6023:      *
6024:      * @return void
6025:      */
6026:     public function freeze( $toggle )
6027:     {
6028:         if ( is_array( $toggle ) ) {
6029:             $this->chillList = $toggle;
6030:             $this->isFrozen  = FALSE;
6031:         } else {
6032:             $this->isFrozen = (boolean) $toggle;
6033:         }
6034:     }
6035: 
6036:     /**
6037:      * Returns the current mode of operation of RedBean.
6038:      * In fluid mode the database
6039:      * structure is adjusted to accomodate your objects.
6040:      * In frozen mode
6041:      * this is not the case.
6042:      *
6043:      * @return boolean
6044:      */
6045:     public function isFrozen()
6046:     {
6047:         return (bool) $this->isFrozen;
6048:     }
6049:     
6050:     /**
6051:      * Determines whether a type is in the chill list.
6052:      * If a type is 'chilled' it's frozen, so its schema cannot be
6053:      * changed anymore. However other bean types may still be modified.
6054:      * This method is a convenience method for other objects to check if
6055:      * the schema of a certain type is locked for modification.
6056:      *  
6057:      * @param string $type the type you wish to check
6058:      * 
6059:      * @return boolean
6060:      */
6061:     public function isChilled( $type )
6062:     {
6063:         return (boolean) ( in_array( $type, $this->chillList ) );
6064:     }
6065: 
6066:     /**
6067:      * Dispenses a new bean (a OODBBean Bean Object)
6068:      * of the specified type. Always
6069:      * use this function to get an empty bean object. Never
6070:      * instantiate a OODBBean yourself because it needs
6071:      * to be configured before you can use it with RedBean. This
6072:      * function applies the appropriate initialization /
6073:      * configuration for you.
6074:      *
6075:      * @param string  $type              type of bean you want to dispense
6076:      * @param string  $number            number of beans you would like to get
6077:      * @param boolean $alwaysReturnArray if TRUE always returns the result as an array
6078:      *
6079:      * @return OODBBean
6080:      */
6081:     public function dispense( $type, $number = 1, $alwaysReturnArray = FALSE )
6082:     {
6083:         if ( $number < 1 ) {
6084:             if ( $alwaysReturnArray ) return array();
6085:             return NULL;
6086:         }
6087:         
6088:         $beans = array();
6089:         for ( $i = 0; $i < $number; $i++ ) {
6090:             $bean = new OODBBean;
6091:             $bean->initializeForDispense( $type, $this->beanhelper );
6092:             if ( !$this->isFrozen ) {
6093:                 $this->check( $bean );
6094:             }
6095:             $this->signal( 'dispense', $bean );
6096:             $beans[] = $bean;
6097:         }
6098: 
6099:         return ( count( $beans ) === 1 && !$alwaysReturnArray ) ? array_pop( $beans ) : $beans;
6100:     }
6101: 
6102:     /**
6103:      * Sets bean helper to be given to beans.
6104:      * Bean helpers assist beans in getting a reference to a toolbox.
6105:      *
6106:      * @param BeanHelper $beanhelper helper
6107:      *
6108:      * @return void
6109:      */
6110:     public function setBeanHelper( BeanHelper $beanhelper )
6111:     {
6112:         $this->beanhelper = $beanhelper;
6113:     }
6114: 
6115:     /**
6116:      * Checks whether a OODBBean bean is valid.
6117:      * If the type is not valid or the ID is not valid it will
6118:      * throw an exception: Security.
6119:      *
6120:      * @param OODBBean $bean the bean that needs to be checked
6121:      *
6122:      * @return void
6123:      *
6124:      * @throws Security $exception
6125:      */
6126:     public function check( OODBBean $bean )
6127:     {
6128:         //Is all meta information present?
6129:         if ( !isset( $bean->id ) ) {
6130:             throw new RedException( 'Bean has incomplete Meta Information id ' );
6131:         }
6132:         if ( !( $bean->getMeta( 'type' ) ) ) {
6133:             throw new RedException( 'Bean has incomplete Meta Information II' );
6134:         }
6135:         //Pattern of allowed characters
6136:         $pattern = '/[^a-z0-9_]/i';
6137:         //Does the type contain invalid characters?
6138:         if ( preg_match( $pattern, $bean->getMeta( 'type' ) ) ) {
6139:             throw new RedException( 'Bean Type is invalid' );
6140:         }
6141:         //Are the properties and values valid?
6142:         foreach ( $bean as $prop => $value ) {
6143:             if (
6144:                 is_array( $value )
6145:                 || ( is_object( $value ) )
6146:             ) {
6147:                 throw new RedException( "Invalid Bean value: property $prop" );
6148:             } else if (
6149:                 strlen( $prop ) < 1
6150:                 || preg_match( $pattern, $prop )
6151:             ) {
6152:                 throw new RedException( "Invalid Bean property: property $prop" );
6153:             }
6154:         }
6155:     }
6156: 
6157:     /**
6158:      * Searches the database for a bean that matches conditions $conditions and sql $addSQL
6159:      * and returns an array containing all the beans that have been found.
6160:      *
6161:      * Conditions need to take form:
6162:      *
6163:      * array(
6164:      *    'PROPERTY' => array( POSSIBLE VALUES... 'John', 'Steve' )
6165:      *    'PROPERTY' => array( POSSIBLE VALUES... )
6166:      * );
6167:      *
6168:      * All conditions are glued together using the AND-operator, while all value lists
6169:      * are glued using IN-operators thus acting as OR-conditions.
6170:      *
6171:      * Note that you can use property names; the columns will be extracted using the
6172:      * appropriate bean formatter.
6173:      *
6174:      * @param string $type       type of beans you are looking for
6175:      * @param array  $conditions list of conditions
6176:      * @param string $addSQL     SQL to be used in query
6177:      * @param array  $bindings   whether you prefer to use a WHERE clause or not (TRUE = not)
6178:      *
6179:      * @return array
6180:      *
6181:      * @throws SQL
6182:      */
6183:     public function find( $type, $conditions = array(), $sql = NULL, $bindings = array() )
6184:     {
6185:         //for backward compatibility, allow mismatch arguments:
6186:         if ( is_array( $sql ) ) {
6187:             if ( isset( $sql[1] ) ) {
6188:                 $bindings = $sql[1];
6189:             }
6190:             $sql = $sql[0];
6191:         }
6192:         try {
6193:             $beans = $this->convertToBeans( $type, $this->writer->queryRecord( $type, $conditions, $sql, $bindings ) );
6194: 
6195:             return $beans;
6196:         } catch ( SQL $exception ) {
6197:             $this->handleException( $exception );
6198:         }
6199: 
6200:         return array();
6201:     }
6202: 
6203:     /**
6204:      * Checks whether the specified table already exists in the database.
6205:      * Not part of the Object Database interface!
6206:      *
6207:      * @deprecated Use AQueryWriter::typeExists() instead.
6208:      *
6209:      * @param string $table table name
6210:      *
6211:      * @return boolean
6212:      */
6213:     public function tableExists( $table )
6214:     {
6215:         return $this->writer->tableExists( $table );
6216:     }
6217: 
6218:     /**
6219:      * Stores a bean in the database. This method takes a
6220:      * OODBBean Bean Object $bean and stores it
6221:      * in the database. If the database schema is not compatible
6222:      * with this bean and RedBean runs in fluid mode the schema
6223:      * will be altered to store the bean correctly.
6224:      * If the database schema is not compatible with this bean and
6225:      * RedBean runs in frozen mode it will throw an exception.
6226:      * This function returns the primary key ID of the inserted
6227:      * bean.
6228:      * 
6229:      * The return value is an integer if possible. If it is not possible to
6230:      * represent the value as an integer a string will be returned. We use
6231:      * explicit casts instead of functions to preserve performance 
6232:      * (0.13 vs 0.28 for 10000 iterations on Core i3).
6233:      *
6234:      * @param OODBBean|SimpleModel $bean bean to store
6235:      *
6236:      * @return integer|string
6237:      *
6238:      * @throws Security
6239:      */
6240:     public function store( $bean )
6241:     {
6242:         $bean         = $this->unboxIfNeeded( $bean );
6243:         $processLists = $this->hasListsOrObjects( $bean );
6244:         if ( !$processLists && !$bean->getMeta( 'tainted' ) ) {
6245:             return $bean->getID(); //bail out!
6246:         }
6247:         $this->signal( 'update', $bean );
6248:         $processLists = $this->hasListsOrObjects( $bean ); //check again, might have changed by model!
6249:         if ( $processLists ) {
6250:             $this->processLists( $bean );
6251:         } else {
6252:             $this->storeBean( $bean );
6253:         }
6254:         $this->signal( 'after_update', $bean );
6255: 
6256:         return ( (string) $bean->id === (string) (int) $bean->id ) ? (int) $bean->id : (string) $bean->id;
6257:     }
6258: 
6259:     /**
6260:      * Loads a bean from the object database.
6261:      * It searches for a OODBBean Bean Object in the
6262:      * database. It does not matter how this bean has been stored.
6263:      * RedBean uses the primary key ID $id and the string $type
6264:      * to find the bean. The $type specifies what kind of bean you
6265:      * are looking for; this is the same type as used with the
6266:      * dispense() function. If RedBean finds the bean it will return
6267:      * the OODB Bean object; if it cannot find the bean
6268:      * RedBean will return a new bean of type $type and with
6269:      * primary key ID 0. In the latter case it acts basically the
6270:      * same as dispense().
6271:      *
6272:      * Important note:
6273:      * If the bean cannot be found in the database a new bean of
6274:      * the specified type will be generated and returned.
6275:      *
6276:      * @param string  $type type of bean you want to load
6277:      * @param integer $id   ID of the bean you want to load
6278:      *
6279:      * @throws SQL
6280:      *
6281:      * @return OODBBean
6282:      *
6283:      */
6284:     public function load( $type, $id )
6285:     {
6286:         $bean = $this->dispense( $type );
6287:         if ( isset( $this->stash[$this->nesting][$id] ) ) {
6288:             $row = $this->stash[$this->nesting][$id];
6289:         } else {
6290:             try {
6291:                 $rows = $this->writer->queryRecord( $type, array( 'id' => array( $id ) ) );
6292:             } catch ( SQL $exception ) {
6293:                 if ( $this->writer->sqlStateIn( $exception->getSQLState(),
6294:                     array(
6295:                         QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_NO_SUCH_COLUMN,
6296:                         QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_NO_SUCH_TABLE )
6297:                 )
6298:                 ) {
6299:                     $rows = 0;
6300:                     if ( $this->isFrozen ) {
6301:                         throw $exception; //only throw if frozen
6302:                     }
6303:                 }
6304:             }
6305:             if ( empty( $rows ) ) {
6306:                 return $bean;
6307:             }
6308:             $row = array_pop( $rows );
6309:         }
6310:         $bean->importRow( $row );
6311:         $this->nesting++;
6312:         $this->signal( 'open', $bean );
6313:         $this->nesting--;
6314: 
6315:         return $bean->setMeta( 'tainted', FALSE );
6316:     }
6317: 
6318:     /**
6319:      * Removes a bean from the database.
6320:      * This function will remove the specified OODBBean
6321:      * Bean Object from the database.
6322:      *
6323:      * @param OODBBean|SimpleModel $bean bean you want to remove from database
6324:      *
6325:      * @return void
6326:      *
6327:      * @throws Security
6328:      */
6329:     public function trash( $bean )
6330:     {
6331:         if ( $bean instanceof SimpleModel ) {
6332:             $bean = $bean->unbox();
6333:         }
6334:         if ( !( $bean instanceof OODBBean ) ) {
6335:             throw new RedException( 'OODB Store requires a bean, got: ' . gettype( $bean ) );
6336:         }
6337:         $this->signal( 'delete', $bean );
6338:         foreach ( $bean as $property => $value ) {
6339:             if ( $value instanceof OODBBean ) {
6340:                 unset( $bean->$property );
6341:             }
6342:             if ( is_array( $value ) ) {
6343:                 if ( strpos( $property, 'own' ) === 0 ) {
6344:                     unset( $bean->$property );
6345:                 } elseif ( strpos( $property, 'shared' ) === 0 ) {
6346:                     unset( $bean->$property );
6347:                 }
6348:             }
6349:         }
6350:         if ( !$this->isFrozen ) {
6351:             $this->check( $bean );
6352:         }
6353:         try {
6354:             $this->writer->deleteRecord( $bean->getMeta( 'type' ), array( 'id' => array( $bean->id ) ), NULL );
6355:         } catch ( SQL $exception ) {
6356:             $this->handleException( $exception );
6357:         }
6358:         $bean->id = 0;
6359:         $this->signal( 'after_delete', $bean );
6360:     }
6361: 
6362:     /**
6363:      * Returns an array of beans. Pass a type and a series of ids and
6364:      * this method will bring you the corresponding beans.
6365:      *
6366:      * important note: Because this method loads beans using the load()
6367:      * function (but faster) it will return empty beans with ID 0 for
6368:      * every bean that could not be located. The resulting beans will have the
6369:      * passed IDs as their keys.
6370:      *
6371:      * @param string $type type of beans
6372:      * @param array  $ids  ids to load
6373:      *
6374:      * @return array
6375:      */
6376:     public function batch( $type, $ids )
6377:     {
6378:         if ( !$ids ) {
6379:             return array();
6380:         }
6381:         $collection = array();
6382:         try {
6383:             $rows = $this->writer->queryRecord( $type, array( 'id' => $ids ) );
6384:         } catch ( SQL $e ) {
6385:             $this->handleException( $e );
6386:             $rows = FALSE;
6387:         }
6388:         $this->stash[$this->nesting] = array();
6389:         if ( !$rows ) {
6390:             return array();
6391:         }
6392:         foreach ( $rows as $row ) {
6393:             $this->stash[$this->nesting][$row['id']] = $row;
6394:         }
6395:         foreach ( $ids as $id ) {
6396:             $collection[$id] = $this->load( $type, $id );
6397:         }
6398:         $this->stash[$this->nesting] = NULL;
6399: 
6400:         return $collection;
6401:     }
6402: 
6403:     /**
6404:      * This is a convenience method; it converts database rows
6405:      * (arrays) into beans. Given a type and a set of rows this method
6406:      * will return an array of beans of the specified type loaded with
6407:      * the data fields provided by the result set from the database.
6408:      *
6409:      * @param string $type type of beans you would like to have
6410:      * @param array  $rows rows from the database result
6411:      *
6412:      * @return array
6413:      */
6414:     public function convertToBeans( $type, $rows )
6415:     {
6416:         $collection                  = array();
6417:         $this->stash[$this->nesting] = array();
6418:         foreach ( $rows as $row ) {
6419:             $id                               = $row['id'];
6420:             $this->stash[$this->nesting][$id] = $row;
6421:             $collection[$id]                  = $this->load( $type, $id );
6422:         }
6423:         $this->stash[$this->nesting] = NULL;
6424: 
6425:         return $collection;
6426:     }
6427: 
6428:     /**
6429:      * Counts the number of beans of type $type.
6430:      * This method accepts a second argument to modify the count-query.
6431:      * A third argument can be used to provide bindings for the SQL snippet.
6432:      *
6433:      * @param string $type     type of bean we are looking for
6434:      * @param string $addSQL   additional SQL snippet
6435:      * @param array  $bindings parameters to bind to SQL
6436:      *
6437:      * @return integer
6438:      *
6439:      * @throws SQL
6440:      */
6441:     public function count( $type, $addSQL = '', $bindings = array() )
6442:     {
6443:         $type = AQueryWriter::camelsSnake( $type );
6444:         if ( count( explode( '_', $type ) ) > 2 ) {
6445:             throw new RedException( 'Invalid type for count.' );
6446:         }
6447:         
6448:         try {
6449:             return (int) $this->writer->queryRecordCount( $type, array(), $addSQL, $bindings );
6450:         } catch ( SQL $exception ) {
6451:             if ( !$this->writer->sqlStateIn( $exception->getSQLState(), array( 
6452:                  QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_NO_SUCH_TABLE,
6453:                  QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_NO_SUCH_COLUMN ) ) ) {
6454:                 throw $exception;
6455:             }
6456:         }
6457: 
6458:         return 0;
6459:     }
6460: 
6461:     /**
6462:      * Trash all beans of a given type. Wipes an entire type of bean.
6463:      *
6464:      * @param string $type type of bean you wish to delete all instances of
6465:      *
6466:      * @return boolean
6467:      *
6468:      * @throws SQL
6469:      */
6470:     public function wipe( $type )
6471:     {
6472:         try {
6473:             $this->writer->wipe( $type );
6474: 
6475:             return TRUE;
6476:         } catch ( SQL $exception ) {
6477:             if ( !$this->writer->sqlStateIn( $exception->getSQLState(), array( QueryWriter::C_SQLSTATE_NO_SUCH_TABLE ) ) ) {
6478:                 throw $exception;
6479:             }
6480: 
6481:             return FALSE;
6482:         }
6483:     }
6484: 
6485:     /**
6486:      * Returns an Association Manager for use with OODB.
6487:      * A simple getter function to obtain a reference to the association manager used for
6488:      * storage and more.
6489:      *
6490:      * @return AssociationManager
6491:      *
6492:      * @throws Security
6493:      */
6494:     public function getAssociationManager()
6495:     {
6496:         if ( !isset( $this->assocManager ) ) {
6497:             throw new RedException( 'No association manager available.' );
6498:         }
6499: 
6500:         return $this->assocManager;
6501:     }
6502: 
6503:     /**
6504:      * Sets the association manager instance to be used by this OODB.
6505:      * A simple setter function to set the association manager to be used for storage and
6506:      * more.
6507:      *
6508:      * @param AssociationManager $assoc sets the association manager to be used
6509:      *
6510:      * @return void
6511:      */
6512:     public function setAssociationManager( AssociationManager $assocManager )
6513:     {
6514:         $this->assocManager = $assocManager;
6515:     }
6516: }
6517: } 
6518: 
6519: namespace RedBeanPHP {
6520: 
6521: use RedBeanPHP\OODB as OODB;
6522: use RedBeanPHP\QueryWriter as QueryWriter;
6523: use RedBeanPHP\Adapter\DBAdapter as DBAdapter;
6524: use RedBeanPHP\Adapter as Adapter;
6525: 
6526: /**
6527:  * @file      RedBean/ToolBox.php
6528:  * @desc      A RedBeanPHP-wide service locator
6529:  * @author    Gabor de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP community
6530:  * @license   BSD/GPLv2
6531:  *
6532:  * ToolBox.
6533:  * The toolbox is an integral part of RedBeanPHP providing the basic
6534:  * architectural building blocks to manager objects, helpers and additional tools
6535:  * like plugins. A toolbox contains the three core components of RedBeanPHP:
6536:  * the adapter, the query writer and the core functionality of RedBeanPHP in
6537:  * OODB.
6538:  *
6539:  * copyright (c) G.J.G.T. (Gabor) de Mooij and the RedBeanPHP Community.
6540:  * This source file is subject to the BSD/GPLv2 License that is bundled
6541:  * with this source code in the file license.txt.
6542:  */
6543: class ToolBox
6544: {
6545: 
6546:     /**
6547:      * @var OODB
6548:      */
6549:     protected $oodb;
6550: 
6551:     /**
6552:      * @var QueryWriter
6553:      */
6554:     protected $writer;
6555: 
6556:     /**
6557:      * @var DBAdapter
6558:      */
6559:     protected $adapter;
6560: 
6561:     /**
6562:      * Constructor.
6563:      * The toolbox is an integral part of RedBeanPHP providing the basic
6564:      * architectural building blocks to manager objects, helpers and additional tools
6565:      * like plugins. A toolbox contains the three core components of RedBeanPHP:
